GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2_0: evaṃ tāvat prathame vimarśe dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā dhvaniśāstragataṃ granthāntaraṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2_1: dūṣayituṃ sāmānyena tāvat kāvyagatam anaucityollāsarūpaṃ dūṣaṇaprapañcam upapādayitum
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2_2: āha - iha khalv ityādinā / uktam iti sahṛdayaiḥ / antaraṅgam iti sākṣād rasaviṣayatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_0: ityādinā / bahiraṅgam iti vācyamukhena rase paryavasānād vidheyaḥ prādhānyena pratipipādayiṣito
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_1: yo 'rthas tasya avimarśo 'nanusaṃdhānam upasarjanīkaraṇāt / prakramaḥ kasya cid vastuno
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_2: nirvāhāyārambhas tasya bhedo madhye 'nyathīkaraṇam anyathānirvāhaś ca / kramasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_3: paripāṭyā bheda ullaṅghanaṃ vyutkrama iti yāvat / paunaruktyaṃ punaḥpratipādanam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_4: vācyasya vaktavyasya avacanam anuktiḥ / etā avāntarabhedabhinnāḥ pañca dūṣanajātayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6: yad etad ihagranthakṛtā vicārasaraṇim āśritya vidheyāvimarśādidoṣapañcakam udbhāvitaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_1: vicārasya praṇītatvāt / tathā hi / dāsyāḥ putra ityādāv ākrośe ṣaṣṭhyā alukaṃ pratipādayatā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_2: sūtrakṛtā vidheyāvimarśaḥ sūcita eva / tathā svāmīśvarādhipatidāyādety atra sūtre
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_3: na hi bhavati gavāṃ svāmī aśveṣu ca iti vadatā bhāṣyakṛtā spaṣṭam eva prakramabhedaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_4: pratipāditaḥ / tathā kṛñcānuprayujyate liṭi iy atrānuprayogasyānuśabdaparyālocanayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_5: vyavahitapūrvaprayogaṃ taṃ pātayāṃ prathamam āsa ityādau niṣedhatā cādīnāṃ ca na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_6: hi bhavati ca vṛkṣaḥ ityādinā prayoganiyamakhyāpanena dyotakatvaṃ kathayatā asthānaprayogalakṣaṇaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_7: kramabhedaḥ kaṭākṣita eva / tathā karmadhārayamatvarthīyābhyāṃ bahuvrīhir laghutvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_8: syād iti vṛttilāghavaṃ cintayatā kātyāyanena paunaruktyam api prakāśitam eva / tathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_9: īṣad asamāptau ity atra pratijñānasamadhigamyaṃ sūtrakāroktaṃ rūpakalakṣaṇam arthaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_11: upamāṃ vyavasthāpayatopamāśrayeṇa vācyāvacanam api dyotitam eva / etena rūpakāśrayeṇāvācyavacanam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_12: api dyotitam eva / tad evaṃ mahāviduṣāṃ mārgam anusṛtya sahṛdayaśikṣādarāya vicārayandaraṃto
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_13: 'sya mahāmater na kaś cit paryanuyogaleśasyāpy avasara ity alam atiprasaṅgena /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_0: etasya ceti sāmānyenānaucityasya / doṣā iti kāvyasya vikṛtatvāpādanād dūṣaṇād doṣā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_1: iti / mugdha iti pṛṣṭasyāprativikṛtatve trīṇi kāraṇāni / prativacanāpratibhānalakṣaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_2: maugdhyaṃ pratibhāne 'py aprauḍharūpatvam asahyatvam / prauḍhatve 'pi guṇāsahiṣṇutvalakṣaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_3: mātsaryam / tāny atra saṃdihyamānatayā krameṇoktāni / yaḥ kilety atraiva cchedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_4: chātrābhyarthanayeti praṣṭṛtvasyāṅgīkṛtam iti prativaktṛtvasya ca nirdeśaḥ / paurobhāgyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_5: doṣaikagrāhitvam / nanu yadi parakīye kāvye parihārāya doṣāṇāṃ vicāraḥ kriyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_0: tat kiṃ nijakāvye na teṣāṃ parihāraḥ / tathā ca bhajate mātsaryamaunaṃ nu kim ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_1: ato 'nantaram iti pṛṣṭa ity evaṃ krameṇetiśabdo nirdeśyaḥ kramāntareṇa nirdeśāt kramabhedo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_2: na yujyate / evam anyat śokāpadānādau jñeyam / tadartham āha - svakṛtiṣv iti kṛtiḥ kāvyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_0: saṃrambha iti kutsitāḥ kariṇaḥ karikīṭāḥ kutsitāni kutsanaiḥ iti samāsaḥ / karikīṭānām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_1: āśādviradaiḥ pratinirdeśaḥ / meghaśakalānāṃ tu kalpāntatoyadaiḥ ya ity atraiva cchedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_2: ayaṃ śloko vakroktijīvite vitatya vyākhyāta iti tata evāvadhāryaḥ / tāvacchabdo vidheyāvimarśatrayasyaitacchlokagatasyopakramadyotakaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_3: saṃbandhopapatter iti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ iti vacanāt samāsaḥ sāmarthyanimittakaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_0: saṅgatatvaṃ ca saṃbandhaḥ / sa cātra viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ / paryudāsasyaiva viśeṣaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_1: nañā abrāhmaṇa iti yathā / na cātra vakṣyamāṇanyāyena paryudāso ghaṭata iti / nanv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_2: abrāhmaṇa ityādau nañ kathaṃ viśeṣaṇam / viśeṣaṇaṃ hi viśeṣyasyoparañjakaṃ bhavati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_3: na ca nañśabdo viruddhatvād vidhim uparañjayati / tat katham asya viśeṣaṇatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_4: naitat / abrāhmaṇa ityādau brāhmaṇaśabdo brāhmaṇasadṛśe kṣatriyādau vartate / sā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_5: cākṣatriyādau brāhmaṇaśabdasya vṛttir nañā dyotyate / tad uktam - nañ ivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_6: tatha hy artha iti / tatra ca śabdaśaktisvābhāvyaṃ kāraṇam / yathā caitat tathā nañsūtrabhāṣyād avaseyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_0: pradhānatvam iti / yatra vidheḥ prādhānyaṃ pratiṣedhasyāprādhānyaṃ naña uttarapadena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_1: saṃbandhaḥ samarthasamāsa ekavākyatvaṃ ca tatra paryudāsaḥ kiṃ cid varjayitvā kasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_2: cid upadeśo nirāsa iti nigamanāt / tatra kārikāyāṃ trayaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ dvayaṃ cākṣipyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_3: jugopeti / atra nañarthaviśiṣṭasyottarapadārthasya vidhir na trastatvādiniṣedhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_4: tatrāpy atrastatvādeḥ siddhatvāt tadanuvādena gopanādi vidhīyata iti paryudāsatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_5: aprādhānyam iti / yatra pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ vidher aprādhānyyaṃ nañaḥ kriyāpadena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13: tatra prasajya prāpayya pratiṣedha iti prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ / atra kārikāyāṃ traye nirdiṣṭe 'nyad dvayam ākṣiptam / na veti / atra dṛptaniśācaraṃ prati niṣedhaḥ pratīyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_0: na tv adṛptaniśācaravidhir iti prasajyapratiṣedhatā / saṃrambhavatpratiṣedho hy atreti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_1: saṃrabdhavān yaḥ puruṣas tadgatā yeyaṃ saṃrabdhatā saṃrambhaṇakriyā tasyā vakṣyamāṇanyāyena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_2: pratiṣedha ity arthaḥ / asaṃradhavadvidhir iti saṃrabdhavatsadṛśasya saṃrambhasadṛśakriyākarttur
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_3: udāsīnaprāyasya vidhir ity arthaḥ / yad uktaṃ nañ iva yuktam ityādi / tatreti saṃrabdahavatpratiṣedhe /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_4: na cāsāv iti pratiṣedhati / tatsiddhipakṣa iti vivakṣito yaḥ pradhānabhūtaniṣedhalakṣaṇo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_5: 'rthasya siddhipakṣa ity arthaḥ / asya vidhyanuvādabhāvasyeti / nañarthasya vidhir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_6: uttarapadārthasyānuvāda ity asya / samāse hi nañarthopasarjana uttarapadārthaḥ prādhānyena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_7: pratīyate / kāvyārtheti / atra vyavacchedyaṃ prasajyapratiṣedhaṃ pradarśya paricchedyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:15: nanu prasajyapratiṣedhe nañaḥ kriyānvaye 'saṃrabdahavān ity atra saṃrambhakriyāniṣedho bhaviṣyati / tat ko 'tra doṣa ity āha:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:17_0: asaṃrabdhavān ity atra dvāv aṃśau kriyāṃśaḥ kārakāṃśaś ca / tatrobhayāṃśabhāgarthaniṣedhe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:17_1: śabdaśaktisvābhāvyād vākye kriyāṃśaniṣedhas tasya prādhānyena vivakṣitasyāparāmarśam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:17_2: anuktād vidheyāvimarśaḥ / yathā ca prasajyapratiṣedhe samāso neṣṭas tathoktanayena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:17_3: paryudāse 'py asamāso neṣyata ity āha - nanu sādhv iti atra na kurvateti karaṇakriyākartṛsadṛśena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:17_4: kriyāṃ praty udāsīnaprāyeṇety arthaḥ / akurvateti vācye na kurvateti kriyāṃśaniṣedhaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:17_5: pratīter vaiparītyakārī / evaṃ nocitam apīty ucitatvamātraniṣedhaḥ pratīter vaiparītyakṛd
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:17_6: eva / tacchravaṇaṃ kriyāśravaṇam / tayor iti siddhārthā vṛttiḥ / sādhyārthaṃ vākyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:17_7: asūryaṃpaśyādiṣv iti / atrāpi nañaḥ sūryeṇottarpadārthena nābhisaṃbandhaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:18_0: api tu taddraṣṭrarthenaiva / tatrāpi kartraṃśaḥ pradhānaṃ na kriyāṃśaḥ karttari khaśo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:18_1: vidhānād iti pūrvavad avaseyam / bhuṅkta iti atra hi vākyasya kriyāprādhānyaṃ pratīyamānabhavatyādikriyāpekṣe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:18_2: nañaḥ samanvaye śrāddhabhojī na bhavatīti vākyārthaḥ / aśrāddhabhojīty atra tu nañā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:18_3: bhoktus samanvaye śrāddhabhoktṛvyatirikto 'pi vighasāśyā+i++ pratīyate / yataś cātrāśrāddhabhojītyādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:19: tata eva samarthasamāsas tadviparyayeṇāsamarthasamāsaś ca kārikādvayenoktaḥ / vākyabhedābhedayos tu sāmarthyāt pratītir ity avacanam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_0: evakemaṃ vidheyāvimarśaṃ vicārya dvitīyam udāharati - yo 'sāv ity atreti tacchabdaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_1: praty ākāṅkṣāyāḥ kenāpy anivarttanāt / ekatareti kvacid yacchabdenopakrame tacchabdenopasaṃhāraḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_2: kva cit tacchabdenopakrame yacchabdenopasaṃhāraḥ prasajyate / etac ca dvayaṃ śābdopakramopasaṃhārakrameṇodāhariṣyati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_3: tayor apīti / apiśabdo nañarthaṃ samuccinoti / prasajyapratiṣedhe hi nañartho vidheyo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_4: niṣedhyo 'rtho 'nuvādyaḥ / paryudāse tu viparyaya ity uktaṃ prāg / anuvādyavidheyeti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_6: vidheyaviṣayatvam / nityatvād iti / apekṣāprāṇatayāvasthānāt / śābda iti śabdenobhayoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_7: saṃsparśād / ubhayoḥ saṃsparśābhāva ārthatvam / tatra dvayī gatiḥ - anyatarānupādānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_8: dvayor anupādānaṃ vā / anyatarānupādanam api yattadāśrayabhāvena dvidhā / krameṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_9: caitad udāhariṣyati / upakalpito nityasāpekṣatvād upasthāpitaḥ / atra ca prasiddhādiviṣayatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_10: yadā nirdiṣṭam / sā kalā yā prasiddheti sphuṭatvena pratīteḥ / kva cit tado 'pi vyapadiśyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:21_0: tasya yacchabdenaikaviṣayatvāt / te iti ye mayaivānubhūte ity arthaḥ / anviyeṣa sa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:21_1: iti / atra sa iti yaḥ prakrānta ity arthaḥ / upāttavastv iti vakṣyamāṇaśloke ko 'pīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:21_2: yad upāttaṃ vastu tadviṣayatvenety arthaḥ / asya upakramopasaṃhārasya prakrāntavastuviṣayasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22_0: tacchabdāt prayogātiprasaṅganiyamaṃ prakāśayan parihāryaṃ viṣayaṃ pradarśayati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22_1: - yas tv ekavākya iti / ekavākyagrahaṇena parāmamṛśyasya pratyakṣāyamāṇatoktā / tataś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22_2: ca vākyabhede na doṣaḥ / kartṛtveneti prādhānyaṃ sūcayati aprādhānyasya parāmarśo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22_3: na duṣyatīti khyāpanārtham / sa ity arthaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ / tebhya iti kartṛtvavācakād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22_4: idamādibhyaś ca / asau tacchabdaḥ / asamanvayād iti tacchabdasya parokṣārthapratipādakatve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22_5: saṃbandhavirodhād ity arthaḥ / tādātmyāyeti / śaśikalāmaulisvarūpatvāyety arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22_6: ārtha iti upakramopasaṃhārakramā nirdiṣṭaḥ / kalpitatatkramādīti / kalpitaṃ tad yac
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22_7: chabdanirdiṣṭaṃ karmādi viṣayo 'syeti yacchabdārthaḥ karmakaraṇāditayā viṣayatvenāsya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22_8: kalpita ity arthaḥ / saṃbandhadvaividhyeti śābdārthabhedena dvaividhyam / yattad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22_9: iti / yacchabdasamīpe samānādhikaraṇas tacchabda upādīyamānaḥ śabdaśaktisvābhāvyāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22_10: prasiddhavastuviṣayaṃ yacchabam ākāṅkṣati / vaiyadhikaraṇyena vyavadhānena ca nirdeśe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22_11: tu nirdiṣṭenaiva yadā samanvayaṃ bhajate / na kevalaṃ yo mahato 'pabhāṣate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:23: śṛṇoti tasmād api yaḥ sa pāpabhāg ity atra yady api yaḥ sa iti yattador nairantaryeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyena ca nirdeśaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:24: tathāpi na yat tad ūrjitam iti nyāyena tacchabdo yacchabdāntaraṃ praty apekṣāyām iha yadi tacchabdo nirantaropāttayacchabdāpekṣayaiva prayujyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:26_0: yāvatā na kevalaṃ ya ity atra yacchabdāpekṣayā vyavadhānena prādhānyāt prayuktas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:26_2: na tacchabdāntaram ākāṅkṣatīty anavadyam etat / tad itthaṃ yattador upakramopasaṃhārakramo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:26_3: dvividhaḥ parighaṭitaḥ / sa cātra śloke na yujyata ity āha - evaṃ ceti / tadupādāna
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:26_4: iti / yacchabdo nātra tad eti prakrāntas tacchabdaḥ parāmṛśyate tatsaṃbandhapratītāv ity arthaḥ.
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_0: nanu prayogadarśanam evātra samarthakaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āśaṅkya prayogasya prāmādikapāṭhaviparyāsahetukatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_1: āha - mīlitam iti / tadabhinnārthaḥ tacchabdābhinnārthaḥ / tasya adaśśabdasya / tacchabdābhinnārthatve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_2: 'daśśabdasya dūṣaṇadvayam uktam / kevalādaśśabdapryoge asau marud ityādau yacchabdākāṅkṣā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_3: syād ity ekaṃ yacchabdasahāyasyādaśśabdasya prayoge yo 'sau jagattrayetyādau prayuktatacchabdākāṅkṣā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_4: na syād iti dvitīyam / atra yasya prakopetyadaśśabdarahitayacchabdaprayogo dṛṣṭāntatvenokto
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_5: yathāsya kevalasya tacchabdākāṅkṣā tathādaśśabdayuktasyāpīty arthaḥ / parikalpyata
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_6: iti tasya yathoktavastv iti yathā avigānena śiṣṭaprasiddhipāraṃparyeṇoktaṃ vastu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_7: tacchabdārthavivikto viṣayas tasya tanmate asaṃbhavaḥ / tvayā hy adaśśabdasya tacchabdārthatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_8: ucyate tatra yacchabdaparāmarśāpekṣāprasaṅgaḥ ity arthaḥ / parikalpyata iti prayogapravāhaprāmāṇyānyathānupapattyāvāyātayārthāpattyety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_9: arthaḥ / tam antareṇeti / tacchabdena prayogapravāhaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ / tadatadarthatvaniścayo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_10: vivakṣitāvivakṣitārthatvaniścayaḥ / yadi tu tām iti tadabhinnārthatānupapattiḥ parāmṛṣṭā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_11: gate 'nugataṃ yasya sa gatānugatikaḥ / matvarthīyo 'tra ṭhanpratyayaḥ / yenaiva pathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_12: eko gacchati tenaivāvicāritenaiva yo gacchati sa ity arthaḥ / tato bhāvapratyayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_13: avikalpam ity akārapraśleṣaḥ / niśśaṅkam ity arthaḥ / yad vā na vikalpamātreṇa,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:28_0: api tu sākṣād ity arthaḥ / smṛtibhūḥ kāmaḥ / dvitīyaḥ smṛtibhūśabdaḥ smaraṇaviṣaye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:28_1: prayuktaḥ / dagdhatvāt smṛtimātraśeṣa ity arthaḥ / kṣatāt vadhāt / vyavahitānām eveti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:28_2: yathā yo 'vikalpam ityādau / avyavahitatve veti / yathā smṛtibhūr ityādau / etadartham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:29_0: tatra hīti idamādisahitaprayoge / tayor iti yattadoḥ / taditareti yadṛcchayaikataraprayoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:29_1: anyatarāpekṣety arthaḥ / sutarām iti idamādisāhityena prayukto yacchabdaḥ svabhāvato
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:30: evaṃ tacchabdo 'pi yacchabdam iti jñeyam / etac ca krameṇodāhṛtaṃ yad etad iti,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:31: so 'yam iti ca / tad anyena granthena pradarśaka upayujyate tadvad asya yacchabdasya na prakrāntaparāmarśe saṃbandho,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:32_0: nāpi prakraṃsyamānavastusamanvayamārgopadeśe tacchabdādhyāhāraḥ śaraṇam / sa ca satkāvyakalaṅkāyamāno
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:32_1: heya eva anuktvaiveti yattador madhye parāmṛśyam anuktvā yatra nirantaraḥ prayogaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:32_2: yathā yat tad ūrjitam ityādau tatra tayor yattador yathāyogaṃ punaḥ prayogo na duṣyati
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:32_3: yatha nūnaṃ tad api hāritam ityādau / tathā tayor yattadoḥ / nirantaranirdiṣṭeṣv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:32_4: idamādiṣu satsu tayor yattadoḥ teṣām idamādīnāṃ ca saṅghaṭitatvena sthitānāṃ yathāyogaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:32_5: yattadoḥ pratyavekṣā na nivarttate yathā aprayukteṣv idamādiṣu kevalayoḥ pṛthagavasthitayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:32_6: apekṣā na nivarttate tadvat prayukteṣv apīty arthaḥ yathā yad etac candrāntar iti,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:33_0: so 'yaṃ paṭa iti ca / evaṃ prakṛte 'pi yo 'sāv iti / tatsāṅkaryeti / yacchabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:33_1: pṛthag idamādisāhitye tacchabdasya ca pṛthag idamādisāhitye yattadoḥ parasparasāhitye ca bahavo bhedāḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:36_0: sa prasaṅgād vicāryate / sa ca puṣṭāpuṣṭaduṣṭabhedena trividhaḥ / puṣṭo 'pi prathamaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:36_2: ceti dvividhaḥ / ārtho 'pi yacchabdamātrānupādāne tacchabdasyopāttasya prasiddhānubhūtaprakrāntaviṣayeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:36_3: yadābhisaṃbandhāt trividhaḥ / yacchabdasya ca tacchabdānupādāne kevalam upāttasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:36_4: prakrāntaviṣayeṇa kalpitatatkarmādiviṣayeṇa ca tadābhisaṃbandhād dvividhaḥ / ubhayānupādāne
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:36_5: tu dvayor upāttavastuviṣayatākalpana eka eva bhedaḥ / evaṃ śābdo dvividha ārthaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:36_6: ṣaḍbheda ity aṣṭavidho yattador upakramopasaṃhārakramaḥ puṣṭaḥ / tac caitac ceha
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:36_7: granthakṛtodāhṛtam / yat tadūrjitam ityādau tu śābdasyārthasya copasaṃhārakramasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:36_8: saṅkīrṇatvam iti nāsya pṛthagbhāvaḥ / apuṣṭasya duṣṭamadhye prasaṅgena varṇayiṣyamāṇatvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:36_9: idānīṃ duṣṭo vyākriyate / tatra yattadoḥ sthāne tacchabdayacchabdanairantaryeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:36_10: cedamādīnaṃ duṣṭataiva teṣām atadarthatvāt tannikaṭe ca prayujyamānānāṃ prasiddhimātraparāmarśakatvād,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:37_0: yathā yo 'sau kutra camatkṛter iti / evaṃ tacchabdasācivyenedamādīnām udāharaṇam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:37_1: ūhyam / viprakṛṣṭatvena sannikṛṣṭatve 'pi vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā teṣām prayoge na duṣṭaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:37_2: nāduṣṭam ity apuṣṭatvam eva yathā yo 'vikalpam iti smṛtibhūḥ smṛtibhūr iti ca / evaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:38: yathā sa vaḥ śaśikalāmaulir ityādau / pradhānagrahaṇena na kartṛmātraṃ nirdiṣṭam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:39: api tu kārakāntaram api prādhānyena vivakṣitatvāt pratyakṣāyamāṇam / tena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:42_0: iti medinyās tacchabdaparāmarśo na sundara ity āhuḥ / yathā yattadoḥ padārthavākyārthagatatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:42_1: dvividhāvasthāne yad ekasya padārthaniṣṭhatvād anyasya vākyārthaviṣayatvaṃ tad bhinnaviṣayatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:43: hemrāṃ bhāraśatāni vā madamucāṃ bṛndāni vā dantināṃ śrīharṣeṇa yad arpitāni guṇine bāṇāya kutrādya tat /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:44: yā bāṇena tu tasya sūktivisarair uṭṭaṅkitāḥ kīrttayas tat kalpapralaye 'pi yānti na manāṅ manye parimlānatām //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:45_0: iti / yā iti padārthaviṣayatvam anipātasya tacchabdasya / tad iti tu vākyārthaviṣayas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:45_1: tacchabdaḥ / padārthaviṣaye tā iti syāt / atraiva yad bāṇena tu tasyeti tāḥ kalpapralaye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:45_2: 'pi iti ca pāṭhe yado vākyārthaviṣayatve tadaḥ padārthaniṣṭhatva udāharaṇaṃ deyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:45_3: tasmād yā bāṇena tv iti tāḥ kalpapralaye 'pīti ca paṭhanīyam / iha tu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:46: indīvaraṃ yadatasīkusumasya vṛttyā yat ketakaṃ jaraḍhabhūrjadalānuvṛttyā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:47: yan manyase ca vakulaṃ karavīravṛttyā sā sāmprataṃ madhupa hanta tavaiva hāniḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:49_0: yāvat tacchabdo 'pi / yadi paraṃ sa vākyārtho hānipadena piṇḍīkṛtya prakāśitas tacchabdena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:49_1: parāmṛṣṭaḥ / ata evātra tacchabdasya vidheyapadārthābhiprāyeṇa strīliṅgatvam / anuvādyābhiprāyeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:49_2: tu tat sāmpratam iti / ubhayathāpi liṅgaparigrahaḥ śiṣṭapravāhe sthitaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:50_0: kiṃ ca yattador nityābhisaṃbandhād guṇapradhānayoś ca saṃbandhārhatvāt parāmṛśya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:50_1: ekatra yacchabdavākye tacchabdavākye vā nirdiṣṭa itaravākye tadā yadā vā pratyavamṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:50_2: yacchabdavākye tu nirdiṣṭena yacchabdāntareṇa guṇānāṃ pradhānānāṃ ca parasparam abhisaṃbandhāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:50_3: evaṃ ca tathā parāmarśe dvau duṣṭābhedau / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:51: yeṣāṃ tās tridaśebhadānasaritaḥ pītāḥ pratāpoṣmabhir līlāpānabhuvaś ca nandanatarucchāyāsu yaiḥ kalpitāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:52: yeṣāṃ huṅkṛtayaḥ kṛtāmarapurakṣobhāḥ kṣapācāriṇāṃ kiṃ tais tvatparitoṣakāri vihitaṃ kiṃ cit pravādocitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:53_0: iti / kṣapācāriṇām iti ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ yacchabdena saṃbaddhaṃ yacchadbāntareṇa partyavamṛṣṭam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:53_1: kṣapācāribhir iti pāṭho nyāyyaḥ / evaṃ tacchabdavākye nirdiṣṭaṃ yacchabdaiḥ parāmṛśyamānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:54: puṇḍrekṣoḥ paripākapāṇḍunibiḍe yo madhyame parvaṇi khyātaḥ kiṃ ca rasaḥ kaṣāyamadhuro yo rājajambūphale /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:55: tasyāsvādadaśāviluṇṭanapaṭur yeṣāṃ vacovibhramaḥ sarvatraiva jayanti citramatayas te bharttṛmeṇḍādayaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:56: iti / atra dvitīye yacchabdavākye rasaḥ parāmṛśyo nirdiṣṭas tacchabdena parāmṛśyate / prathame yacchabdavākye tu yacchadaparāmarśo na yujyate dvayor asaṃbandhād, yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:57: namo 'stu tābhyo bhuvane jayanti tāḥ sudhāmucas tāś ca kavīndrasūktayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:58: bhavaikavicchedi kathāśarīratām upaiti yāsāṃ caritaṃ pinākinaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:59_0: iti kavīndrasūktīnāṃ tacchabdavati vākyena nirdiṣṭānāṃ tacchabdāntareṇa parāmarśo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:59_1: na yuktaḥ / kiṃ ca yattacchabdayoḥ svabhāvena vākyabhedotthāpakatve yad ekataravākye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:59_2: 'nyatarat padaṃ prayujyānyatarat prayujyate tad api duṣṭam eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:60: aprākṛtasya caritātiśayaiś ca dṛṣṭair atyadbhutair apahṛtasya tathāpi nāsthā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:61: ko 'py eṣa vīraśiśukākṛtir aprameyamāhātmyasārasam udāyamayaḥ padārthaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:62: ity atra yady apīty apekṣitam / na ca tadekavākyatāyāṃ saṃbandhuṃ yogyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:63_0: ekatrāpi vākye guṇakriyādigataṃ kalpitaṃ bhedam āśritya prakrāntavastuviṣayatacchabdaprayoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:63_1: pradhānakriyāyāṃ parāmṛśyasya pradhānatvād eva svarūpeṇa nirdeśe guṇakriyādiviṣaye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:63_2: tu tacchabdena parāmarśe nyāyye yadviparyayakaraṇaṃ tad duṣṭam eva / yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:64: prajānām eva bhūtyarthaṃ sa tābhyo balim agrahīt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65: sahasraguṇam utsraṣṭum ādatte hi rasaṃ raviḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:66: iti / baliṃ prajābhyo jagrāha sa tāsām eva bhūtaye iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ / tathaikaviṣayatve yattador ekasya dravyādiviṣayatve 'nyasya kālādigocaratve duṣṭam eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:67: tvam evaṃ saundaryā sa ca ruciratāyāḥ paricitaḥ kalānāṃ sīmānaṃ param iha yuvām eva bhajathaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68: ayi! dvandvaṃ diṣṭyā tad iti subhage! saṃvadati vāmataḥ śeṣaṃ yat syāj jitam iha tadānīṃ guṇitayā //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:69: atra ataḥ śeṣaṃ cet syād iti paṭhanīyaṃ cec chabdasya yadiśabdārthatvāt / tathā prakrāntaviṣayatve tacchabdasya vyavasthite tadviṣaye prakramyamāṇavastugocaratvaṃ doṣa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:70: ye saṃtoṣasukhaprabuddhamanasas teṣāṃ na bhinno mado ye 'py ete dhanalobhasaṃkuladhiyas teṣāṃ tu dūre nṛṇām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:71: itthaṃ kasya kṛte kṛtaḥ sa vidhinā tādṛk padaṃ saṃpadāṃ svātmany eva samāptahemamahimā merur na me rocate //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:72: atra meruḥ prakramyamāṇaḥ sa ity anena parāmṛṣṭaḥ / etad vākyabheda udāharaṇam / ekavākye tu:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:73: tīrthe tadīye gajasetubandhāt pratīpagām uttarato 'sya gaṅgām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:74: iti deyam / tathā nirvīpsenaikenopakrame savīpsenānyena parāmarśo duṣṭa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:75: yaḥ kalyāṇabahirbhūtaḥ sa sa durgatim aśnute /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:76: savīpsena tv ekena prakrame nirvīpsenānyenopasaṃhāraḥ savīpsasya pratyavamṛṣṭatvād na duṣṭānvayaḥ kin tv apuṣṭa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:77: kalyāṇānāṃ tvam asi mahasāmīśiṣe tvaṃ vidhatse puṇyāṃ lakṣmīm iha mayi ciraṃ dhehi deva! prasīda /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:78: yad yat pratijahi jagannātha! namrasya tan me bhadraṃ bhadraṃ vitara bhagavan! bhūyase maṅgalāya //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:79: iti / atra yad yad iti nirdiṣṭaṃ kevalena tacchabdena parāmṛṣṭam / etad yacchabdasya savīpsasyodāharaṇam / tacchabdasya tu savīpsasya nirvīpsena parāmarśa udāharaṇaṃ yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:80: kṣāntaṃ na kṣamayā gṛhocitasukhaṃ tyaktaṃ na santoṣataḥ soḍho dussahaśītavātatapanakleśo na taptaṃ tapaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:81: dhyātaṃ nityam ahar niśaṃ niyamitaprāṇair na śambhoḥ padaṃ tat tat karma kṛtaṃ yad eva munibhis tais taiḥ phalair vañcitāḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:82: iti / yatra tu savīpsasya prakrame savīpsena pratyavamarśas tatra puṣṭatvam eva yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83: yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibhartti svabhujagurum adaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ yo yaḥ pāñcālagotre śiśur adhikavayā garbhaśayyāṃ gato vā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:84: yo yas tatkarmasākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaś ca yaś ca pradīptaḥ krodhāndhas tasya tasya svayam api jagatām antakasyāntako 'ham //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:85: iti / yatra cānekasya savīpsasya cānekena pratyavamarśas, tatrāpi puṣṭatvam eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:86: yo yo yaṃ yam avāpnuyād avayavoddeśaṃ spṛśan pāṇinā tat tanmātrakam eva yatra sa sa te rūpaṃ paraṃ manyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:87: tajjātyandhapuraṃ ha hā karipate! nīto 'si durvedhasā ko nāmātra bhaved batākhilabhavan māhātmyavedī janaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:88_0: iti / yadi paraṃ yaṃ yam iti prakrame tat tanmātrakam eveti pratyavamarśe vidheyāvimarśaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:88_1: savīpsasya tadarthasya samāse guṇībhāvāt / naitat / mātragrahaṇenāvadhāraṇam ucyate
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:88_3: ity avadhāryamāṇasyaiva savīpsasya tadarthasyodrekāt prādhānyam akhaṇḍitam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:88_4: pūrvapadārthaprādhānyena kva cit supsupeti samāso dṛśyate, yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89: nirvāṇabhūyiṣṭham athāsya vīryaṃ sandhukṣayantīva vapur guṇena /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:91_0: iti / atra hi bhūyiṣṭhaṃ nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇabhūyiṣṭham iti samāse nirvāṇārthasyaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:91_1: prādhānyaṃ tasya vīryaviśeṣaṇatvenāvasthitatvād / na tadvad iha tattanmātrakam iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:91_2: tadarthasya prādhānyaṃ bhaviṣyati / kevalaṃ kṛte 'vadhāraṇārthe mātraśabde kimarthaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:91_3: kapratyayaḥ / tasminn api vā kṛte evaśabdaḥ kimarthaḥ / evaśabda eva vā kiṃ na kriyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:91_4: naitat / kapratyayasya tāvad atra kutsāpratipādakatvāt / na paunaruktyaṃ tan tameveti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:91_5: kevalaivaśabdaprayoge vikṣipta iva tadarthaḥ pratīyate / mātragrahaṇe tu piṇḍitasyaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:91_6: tadarthasya pratītir ity asti viśeṣaḥ / yadi paraṃ dvayor upādānaṃ lokapratītyanusaraṇena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:91_8: prayogaḥ / yathā - bālā kevalam eva roditi galallolodakair aśrubhiḥ / atraiva tad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:91_9: iti nirvīpsena tadā nirdiṣṭaṃ jātyandhapuraṃ nirvīpsenaiva yadā pratyavamṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:91_10: tataś cātrānuguṇaparāmarśān na doṣaḥ kaś cit /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92: tathā yatra pūrvavākye yacchabdo nirdiṣṭa uttaravākye tu na tacchabdo nirdiṣṭaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94: mīlitaṃ yad abhirāmatādhike sādhu candramasi puṣkaraiḥ kṛtam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95: iti / uttaravākyagatatvena tu yacchabdaprayoge pūrvavākye tacchabdaprayoge na duṣṭatvam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_0: api tu prākpratipāditaṃ puṣṭatvam eva sāmānyenopakramāt paścād viśeṣasyotthāpanāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_1: etadabhiprāyeṇa kalpitatatkarmādiviṣayatvam uktam / udāharaṇaṃ tu sādhu candramasi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_2: puṣkaraiḥ kṛtaṃ mīlitaṃ yadabhirāmatādhike iti pūrvaślokārdhapāṭhaviparyaye yathā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_3: yattacchabdayor aviśiṣṭe 'pi parāmarśakatve uttaravākye nirdiṣṭo yacchabdaḥ svabhāvata
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_0: tacchabdas tu parokṣāyamāṇārthaniṣṭhatvāt vaidūryeṇa / āvidūryaṃ ca prakṛtārthaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_1: prakṛṣṭatāṃ nayad vākyārthaṃ śleṣayati / tataś ca tathābhūte viṣaye yacchabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:98: tasyāḥ śalākāñjananirmiteva kāntir bhruvor ānatarekhayor yā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99: tāṃ vīkṣya līlācaturām anaṅgaḥ svacāpasaundaryam adaṃ mumoca //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100: atra sā yāṃ vīkṣyeti yattadau viparyayeṇa paṭhanīyau / yathā ca:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:101: dṛṣṭir nāmṛtavarṣiṇī smitamadhuprasyandi vaktraṃ na kiṃ nārdrārdraṃ hṛdayaṃ na candanarasasparśāni vāṅgāni ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:102: kasmin labdhapadena te kṛtam idaṃ krūreṇa dagdhāgninā nūnaṃ vajramayo 'nya eva dahanas tasyedam āceṣṭitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:104: ācāryo me sa khalu bhagavān asmadgrāhyanāmā tasmād eṣā dhanur upaniṣat tatprasādāt kṣamo 'pi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105: adhyāsīnaḥ katham aham aho vartma vaikhānasānāṃ sītāpāṇigrahaṇapaṇitaṃ cāpam āropayāmi //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_0: atra ca yasmād eṣā dhanur upaniṣad iti paṭhanīyam / evaṃ ca prāg ukte hemno bhārataśatānītyādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_1: tā bāṇena tu tasya sūktivisarair uṭṭaṅkitāḥ kīrtayo yāḥ kalpapralaye 'pi yānti na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_2: manāṅ manye parimlānatām iti paṭhanīyam / api ca parāmṛśyam anuktvā yacchabdena ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_3: vākyārthopakrame tacchabdavati parāmṛśyanirdeśe pūrvavākyārthe parāmṛśyam aspṛśantī
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_4: upaplavamānā pratītir iti vākyārthapratipattiviprakarṣād apuṣṭatvam / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:108: svasthād evāvamānena dehinas tad varaṃ rajaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:109_0: ata evātra ślokārdhayor viparyayapāṭhe puṣṭatvam eva / tathā pūrvavākyārthe nirdiṣṭasyārthasyottaravākyārthe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:109_1: sarvanāmamātreṇa parāmarśe nyāyye yaḥ svaśabdasahitasya sarvanāmno nirdeśaḥ sa duṣṭa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:110: udanvacchinnā bhūḥ sa ca nidhir apāṃ yojanaśataṃ sadā pānthaḥ pūṣā gaganaparimāṇaṃ kalayati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:111: iti prāyo bhāvaḥ sphuradavadhimudrāmukulitaḥ satāṃ prajñonmeṣaḥ punar ayam asīmā vijayate //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:112_0: iti / atra sa ca nidhir apām iti sasvaśabdaḥ sarvanāmno nirdeśaḥ / evaṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:112_1: iti prakṛte tasminn adrau kati cid ity atra jñeyam / atra tu ke cit samarthayante
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:112_2: - rāmagiryāśrameṣv iti rāmagiriḥ samāsa upasarjanībhūto buddhāv udrekeṇānavabhāsāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:112_3: kathaṃ sarvanāmnā parāmṛśyate sarvanāmnānusandhir vṛtticchannasyeti pradhānabhūtaparāmṛśyābhiprāyeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:112_4: sthitaṃ yathā samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhir iti tad vyutpādyate iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:112_5: atrādrāv iti nirdiśyamānam adrimātrapratīter na prakṛtam adriṃ gamayet / tasmād ubhayam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:112_6: atropādeyaṃ yathā atha śabdnānuśāsanam / keṣāṃ śabdānām iti / giriśabdena girau prakrānta
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:112_7: adriśabdena paryāyāntareṇa tv āgatam āsamañjasyaṃ duṣpariharam eveti / udanvacchinnā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:112_8: bhūr ity atra tu udanvataḥ parāmṛśyasya naikaṭhyād yogyatvāc ca bhuvaḥ strītvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:112_9: sa iti parāmarśānarhatvāc ca sarvanāmaparāmarśa eva yukto,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:113_0: na punaḥ svaśabdagocaratvam ity atra duṣṭataiva / kiṃ ca samudāyasya kasya cit kena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:113_1: cid vākyena nirdeśe vākyāntare tadavayavasya nirdhāreṇa karttavye tasya samudāyasaya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:114: tasmād ajāyata manur navarājabījaṃ yasyānvaye sa sagaraḥ sa bhagīrathaś ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115: ekena yena jaladhiḥ parikhānito 'yam anyena siddhasaritā paripūritaś ca //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:116_0: atra sa sagaraḥ sa bhagīrathaś ceti yan nirdiṣṭaṃ tasyaiketyādinā nirdhāraṇaṃ vihitam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:116_1: nirdhāraṇaṃ ca jātiguṇakriyābhiḥ samudāyād ekadeśasya pṛthak karaṇam / na cātra samudāyaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:116_2: kena cit padena nirdiṣṭaḥ / yaccaikeneti nirdiṣṭam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:118_0: api tv ekadeśaḥ / tataś ca nirdeśyānirdeśād anirdeśyanirdeśyāc cātra duṣṭatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:118_1: evaṃ ca samudāyasyaiva nirdhāraṇaviṣayasya yacchabdena nirdeśe karttavye eko yayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:118_2: jalanidhīn nicakhāna sapta gāṅgaiḥ payobhir abhivarṣitavān dvitīyaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ śreyān /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:119: kva cid yattacchabdāv agrahaṇena vidhyanuvādabhāvena vākyārthaprastāve yadantarānyathākaraṇaṃ tatra duṣṭatvaṃ yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:120: yat tvannetrasamānakānti salile magnaṃ tad indīvaram
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:121_0: iti / atra prathamatṛtīyayoḥ pādayor yattacchabdaparigraheṇa vidhyanuvādabhāvenopanibandhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:121_1: dvitīyapādagatatvena tadullaṅghanaṃ doṣaḥ / indīvarāṇāṃ rājahaṃsānāṃ ca bahutvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:121_3: candrasya tv ekatvāt tadakaraṇam iti ke cit / tad asat / candrasyāpi dvitīyācandrādibhedena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:121_4: bahutvasaṃbhavāt tatrāpi vidhyanuvādabhāvo yuktaḥ / indīvarāṇāṃ vyaktibhedena mukhyo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:121_5: bhedaḥ / candrasya punar ekavyaktirūpasya kālabhedād avasthābhedāc ca bhinnatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:121_6: amukhyam iti cen na / bhinnā eva candravyaktayaḥ / anyo hi dvitīyācandro 'nyaś ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:121_7: pūrṇacandraḥ / ataś caiva dvitīyācandrādivyāvṛttyā pūrṇacandrapratītyarthaṃ mukhacchāyānukārīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:121_8: viśeṣaṇaṃ dattam / na hi śaśiśabdaḥ pūrṇacandrābhidhāyī,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:122_0: tasya candramātravācakatvāt / saṅkhyāvyavahāreṣu candrasyaikatvapratītir iti cet /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:122_1: kva cij jātivyavahāreṣv apīndīvarādīnām ekatvaṃ siddham / tasmāt kavivyavahāre candragatatvenānekatvasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:124: masṛṇacaraṇapātaṃ gamyatāṃ bhūḥ sadarbhā viracaya sicayāntaṃ mūrdhni gharmaḥ kaṭhoraḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:125_0: iti / atra viracaya sicayāntam ity atra tacchabdo hetvartho viniveśayitavyas tṛtīyapādādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:125_1: niveśitaḥ / na ca tatra tasyopayogaḥ / kṛtas tatra pratītikuṇṭhatvam utpādayatīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:125_2: kva cit pradhānakriyāyās tadādisarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭasya guṇakriyāyāṃ svaśabdenopādānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:125_3: duṣṭam eva / yathā pratyāsanne nabhasi iti / atra tasmai iti sarvanāmnā pūrvaprakrānto
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:125_4: meghaḥ parāmṛśyata utaitacchlokagato jīmūtaḥ / tatrādye pakṣe jīmūtagrahaṇam anarthakaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:125_5: pradhānakriyāyāṃ tadā parāmṛṣṭasya pūrvaprakrāntasyaiva meghasyārthataḥ saṃbandhayogyatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:125_6: na hi yāvatāṃ yena saṃbandhas tāvatāṃ pratyekaṃ nirdeśaḥ kriyate / ekatra kṛto 'nyatrākāṅkṣādinopajīvyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_0: kṛtaṃ pratyuta vastvantarapratītiṃ janayad vairasyam āvahati / atha tacchabdenaitacchokagato
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_1: jīmūtaḥ pratyavamṛśyate / tad asat / sarvatrātra prakaraṇe pūrvaprakrāntasyaiva meghasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_2: parāmarśaḥ sthita itīhāpi tathaiva parāmarśo nyāyya iti punar api jīmūtagrayaṇam anarthakam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:127_0: itthaṃ dvitīyaṃ vidheyāvimarśaṃ vivicya tṛtīyam apy atraiva śloke prapañcayitum upakramate
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:127_1: - api cetyādinā / prāyeṇeti dvandvaṃ varjayitvā tatra yugapadadhukaraṇavacanatayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:127_2: sāmarthyaṃ prakārāntareṇa samarthitam / tatrādya iti tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:127_3: karmadhārayaḥ iti vacanāt / bahuvrīhiḥ samānādhikaraṇānām iti vacanāt prāyeṇa bahuvrīhiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:127_4: samānādhikaraṇaviṣaya eva / susūkṣmajaṭakeśādau tu vyadhikaraṇānām apīṣyate / tatraiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:127_5: samānādhikaraṇe padārthe / yadā saṅkhyāyā iti vyadhikaraṇa saṅkhyāpūrvo dviguḥ iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:127_6: vacanāt / pratiṣedhasyeti nañ iti nañsūtrārambhāt / dvitīya iti vyadhikaraṇaḥ / kārakāṇām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:127_7: iti kartṛkaraṇe kṛtā bahulam ityādinā / saṃbandhasyeti ṣaṣṭhī ityādinā / tatrāpīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:127_8: kārakasaṃbandhayoge adhistri upakumbham ityādau / svāśrayo viśeṣyam / vidheyadhurām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:127_9: iti śabdavṛtte yo vidheyaḥ tasya kakṣyāṃ vāstavīṃ vidheyatām ity arthaḥ / anūdyamānakalpatayeti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:127_10: śābdaṃ prādhānyam anapekṣya vāstavena prādhānyenety arthaḥ / astam iyād iti ekārthībhāvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:127_11: vibhaktatvenāpratīter ity arthaḥ / ekatreti vidheyānuvādyagarbhatve / anyatreti saṃbandhamātrapratipādane /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:127_12: vikalyeteti mahāvibhāṣayā vyavasthitavibhāṣātvād iti bhāvaḥ / ekasyaiveti / viśeṣaṇagatasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:128_0: aparasya punar iti ca / atra phalabheda ity atra prakrāntaṃ phalaṃ saṃbandhanīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:128_1: atra codayati virodhasyobhayavastuniṣṭhatvāsiddher atrābhāva uktaḥ / tad asat / tarhi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:128_2: na hi sahānavasthānalakṣaṇo vastugata eka eva virodhaḥ bhedo,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_0: yaḥ śītoṣṇādau labdhavṛttiḥ / kiṃ tarhi parasparaparihārasthitatālakṣaṇo vastvavastutvāśrayo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_1: dvitīyo 'py asti virodhaprakāraḥ / tadā hi yadi vastvāśrayo na saṃbhavati virodho
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_2: vastvavastutvāśrayas tu kathaṃ na syād / ataś ca syāt pūrvapakṣavelāyāṃ bhāvābhāvayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_3: evety uktam / naiṣa doṣaḥ / vastvavastvāśrayasya virodhasya tādātmyaniṣedhe vyāpārāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:130: tasyām eva kakṣyāyāṃ svayam aprādhānyaṃ na syād,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:131: aprādhānye vā prādhānyam / prādhānyavidheye punar apekṣāntareṇāprādhānyaṃ kathaṃ na syāt / na syād,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:132_0: yadi śītoṣṇavad dvayor vastutvaṃ syāt / na cātraitad asti vaivakṣikasyāvastutvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:132_1: yathā rājapuruṣa ity atra rājño vaivakṣikam eva prādhānyaṃ vāstavaṃ punar aprādhānyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:132_2: eva tadvad atrāpi draṣṭavyam / tad ayam atra piṇḍārthaḥ saṃsarganiṣedho 'tra kartavyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:132_3: sa ca vastudvayaniṣṭha iti dvayor atrābhāvān naikenāparatra pratiṣedha iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133: anyeneti viśeṣyābhidhāyinety arthaḥ / anyonyam iti / parasparaviśeṣaṇānāṃ yady api viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa iti viśeṣaṇasya viśeṣyeṇaiva samāsa uktaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:134_0: tathāpi kāṇakhañjādiṣu siddhaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayor yatheṣṭatvād iti vacanenaikasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:134_1: viśeṣyatvavivakṣām āśritya parasparaṃ viśeṣaṇānāṃ samāsaḥ samarthitaḥ / tadabhiprāyeṇānyonyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:134_2: iti saṃbhāvanā / dārasukha iti dārāṇāṃ sukheti tatpuruṣaḥ kartavyaḥ / bahuvrīhau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:134_3: rājāhassakhibhyaḥ iti ṭac na syāt / he hasteti / mṛtasya śiśor dvijasya ity atra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:134_4: samāsaḥ śaṅkitaḥ / rāmasya pāṇir asi iti tu ṣaṣṭhīsamāsa udāharaṇam / atra kva cit
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:134_5: kartṝṇām karmaṇāṃ ca prathamāntānāṃ kvāpi saṃbandhināṃ karmaṇāṃ ca ṣaṣṭhyantānāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:134_6: kutrāpy āmantraṇānāṃ samāsaḥ śaṅkitaḥ / vakṣyamāṇanayeneti / vyāsaḥ pārāśaryaḥ ityādivicāreṣu /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:134_7: cāpācārya iti / atra hi tripuravijayitvādyanuvādena cāpācāryatvādividhiḥ / anūdyamānaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:134_8: cārtho vidheyasyotkarṣam āvahan pratīyate / na caivam iti upendravajrasthāne indravajraprayogāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:134_9: upagatam asmābhir iti / duḥśravatvam api vṛttasya śabdānaucityam eva / tasyāpy anuprāsāder
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:134_10: ivetyādivadadbhiḥ / atra yathā ca kāraṇaguṇe ityādigranthaḥ antaraślokaparyantaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:134_11: pratyudāharaṇaṃ yathā taṃ kṛpāmṛdur ity ataḥ pūrvaṃ paṭhitaḥ sāmañjasyaṃ bhajate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:135_0: pratyudāharaṇaṃ ceti udāharaṇagranthaḥ samañjasa eva syāt / dṛśyate ca pustakeṣv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:135_1: evaṃ pāṭhaḥ / tasmād atra jāgaraṇīyam / kāraṇam atra parāśāro jamadagniś ca / tadabhāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:135_2: hetur iti tacchabdena samāsaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ / tataś cātra pārāśaryādipadaṃ vyāsādāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:135_3: utkarṣam arpayat punar uktam / takṣakasarpa iti takṣakaśabdenaivātra sarpaviśeṣatvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:135_4: sarpatve pratīte sarpapadam utkarṣasamarpaṇapravaṇam eveti tadarthasya vidheyatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:135_5: lohitas takṣaka iti yathā takṣakaśabdād eva sarpatvajātiḥ pratītā tadval lohitalakṣaṇo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:135_6: guṇo 'pi tata evāvyabhicārāt pratītaḥ / tatas tau jātiguṇau vidheyatābhiprāyeṇoktau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:135_7: na samāsa nyagbhāvanīyau / uktanyāyād iti vidheyatvān na samāsaḥ pravartata ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:135_8: pakṣo na cāsty anyas tadatyaye iti / iha dvau pakṣāv ullikhitau takṣakasya svarūpamātrapratipādanaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:135_9: vā lohitākhyaguṇavidhir vā / ubhayatrāpi kṛtā carcā / tadatyaye ca kathitapakṣadvayātikrame
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_0: evam iyatā karmadhārayaṃ vicārya bahuvrīhinirūpaṇāyāha bahuvrīhau yatheti / tatas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_1: tad iti sthalīkaraṇādi yad viśeṣaṇatayopāttaṃ tat parāmṛśyate / tair vidhyādibhiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_4: yuktaiva kāryotpattir ity arthaḥ / etadabhyupagame dṛṣṭavirodham āha / evaṃ hīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_5: naiva veti nyāyāviśeṣāt / ardhajaratīyam iti ardhaṃ jaratyā iti samāsāc ca tadviṣayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_6: iti cchapratyayaḥ / yathā jaratyā varāṅgaṃ kāmayate mukhaṃ na kāmayate tadvad evety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_7: arthaḥ / tat tasya iti tad iti tasmāt / tau sūryacandramasau / tayor iti anuvādyayos
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_8: sūryācandramasoḥ / pāramparyeṇeti vidheyatām āha pitāmahatvadvāreṇa / ata eva sūryācandramasāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_9: iti dvandvanirdeśo dvayoḥ spardhitāṃ prakāśayati / urvaśyā ca bhuvā ceti samāsābhāvo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_10: varaṇasya mukhyāmukhyatvapradarśanārtham ekasya vāstavatvād aparasya kaviprauḍhoktiniṣpāditatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_11: iha ceti pratītivaicitryaṃ spaṣṭataram eva dhārayatu matimān iti pāścātya sanbandhanāyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_12: janaka iti / atra janakākhyarājarṣiprabhṛtayaḥ pitṛtvāder utkarṣam arpayanti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_0: evaṃ bahuvrīhiṃ vicārya dviguṃ vyācaṣṭe dvigau yatheti / niravaśeṣa iti saptatvasaṅkhyāyāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_1: vidheyatvena saṃrambhāspadatvaṃ samāse tu nyagbhāvāt / daśasv iti daśatvasaṅkhyāyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_2: vidheyatvaṃ rāvaṇasya paribhavātiśayaṃ prakāśayati ekasminn api mūrdhani padanyāsaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_3: paribhavāspadaṃ kiṃ punar daśāsv iti / pratyudāharaṇaṃ saptāṅgyām iha yasya sa itītyādipāṭhe /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_4: vaiśasaṃ bādhaḥ / evaṃ dviguṃ vyākhyāya nañsamāsaṃ vyācaṣṭe nañsamāseti / upadarśitam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_5: iti asaṃrabdhavān ity atra vidheyāvimarśavicāre anuktavān iti noktavān iti vācyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_6: tatpuruṣe kartrādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ kārakāṇāṃ saṃbandhasya ca krameṇodāharaṇāny āha deśetyādinā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_7: so 'yam iti / atra sa evāyam iti vyākhyā / ahitasaṃbandhināṃ śastrāṇāṃ ghasmarāṇi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_8: grasanaśīlāni ata eva gurūṇi / karaṇaṃ pratīti kriyāṃ pratīty arthaḥ / tat tasyeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_9: prakrāntasya viśeṣyasya karaṇasya / tasyeti rāmasya / śauryaṃ balam / nighnaḥ paravaśaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:138_0: anekeṣām iti / anekaśabdasya nañsamāse uttarapadārthaprādhānyād ekavacanaprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:138_1: satyam kiṃ tu nañprayogaviṣaye ekaśabdasyaikavyatiriktavastuviṣayatvaṃ yathā abrāhmaṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:138_2: ity atra brāhmaṇaśabdasya kṣatriyādigocaratvam / ekavyatiriktaṃ ca vastu kadā cid
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:139_0: kadā cin nijenaiva svarūpeṇa / ādye pakṣe anekam iti bhavati dvitīye tv anekānīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:139_1: yathā ca padamañjariḥ patañjaliḥ - pravṛttibhede prayojakaṃ cittam ekam anekeṣām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:139_2: iti / gurudattam iti guruṇā dattam iti vācyam / tat tasyā iti sītāyā viśeṣaṇabhūtāyāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:139_3: sītākartṛtkāyā gamanakriyāyā ity arthaḥ / gurvartham iti gurave idaṃ gurvartham iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:139_4: kriyāviśeṣaṇam etat / kriyāviśeṣaṇānāṃ karmatvaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgatvaṃ ca / īpsitatamatve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:139_5: tu ṣaṣṭhī syāt / arthanakriyāmukheneti arthayata iti nigamanāt / tat tasyeti tad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:139_6: gurvartham iti viśeṣaṇam / tasyārthinaḥ / avamatatām anabhipretatām / avamatatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:139_7: garhitatvam / sutanirviśeṣam iti / kriyāviśeṣaṇam eva / pradakṣiṇakriyety atra pradakṣiṇakriyāyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:139_9: iti prāthamyasya / tathā yathākāmatvayathākālatvayor jñeyam / yadavalokaneti rūpasampat parāmṛṣṭā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_1: lekhanaṃ praty utkarṣanimittam api samāse guṇīkṛtaḥ / pūrvavad iti kṛtasamāsavaiśasam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_2: tac ca vipradattam iti pāṭhe / pitāmahapitāmatayeti pitāmaho brahmā pitāmahaḥ pūrvapuruṣo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_3: yasya / tayor janmanidhanayoḥ / tadvato janmanidhanavataḥ / tābhyāṃ janmanidhanābhyām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_4: kṭāntād adhikam āsamudrāt kṣitīśānām iti ca vācyam / apādānasamānanyāyatvād avadhir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_5: api pañcamyanto 'tra gṛhyata iti pratyudāharaṇopapattiḥ / upāgatemeti upāgatā iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:141_0: raṇabhūṣita iti / atra raṇabhuvīti vācyam / śocanīyatāgatiḥ kriyā / tatra samāgamaprārthanā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:141_1: hetutvenopāttā / tasyāḥ saṃbandhidvāreṇa saṃbandhitvamukhena kapālina iti viśeṣaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:143_0: sudhīram uvāceti / tat tasyā iti / tad viśeṣaṇam / tasyās samāgamaprārthanāyāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:143_1: tatra śocanīyatāgatau / sāmarthyam avyabhicāreṇa sampādakatvam / tasya sakaleti tacchabdaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:143_2: kapālina ity asya parāmarśakaḥ / viśeṣyeṇa samāgamaprārthanayety anena / pratyavaraṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:146_0: taveti cety eṣāṃ viśeṇaṇānām utkarṣasamarpakatvaṃ jñeyam / tasyaiveti gauravadurāropatvanibandhanasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:146_1: harasya / tacceti prādhānyam / tasyeti harasya / kalpitārthasyeti vistāritakṛtrimatvamātravācino
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:146_3: guṇāntaralābha iti vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇasya vācyāvacanasya parihārāt / mātreti evaṃ kṛtam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:146_4: ity atra karaṇam / niṣka ābharaṇaviśeṣaḥ / vibhaktyanvayeti śrūyamāṇāyā vibhakter
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:146_5: ity arthaḥ / tathā ca ṣaṣṭhyā ākrośe iti jñāpakam rūpakam upadeśa iṣyata iti pramāṇāntareṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:146_6: loko vedas tathādhyātmaṃ pramāṇaṃ trividham ity uktarūpeṇa siddhau yau svasya viśeṣaṇasyotkarṣāpakarṣau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:146_7: tadādhāyinām arthād viśeṣyaṃ pratīty arthaḥ / ārthaṃ vāstavam / alukam āha ṣaṣṭhyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:146_8: ākrośe ity anena / cintyam iti / etadavagamāya vicāryam ity arthaḥ / samāse ca vibhaktilopād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:146_9: iti / iha hi vibhaktiśravaṇāśravaṇe vā anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ viśeṣaṇagatayor vāstavayoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:146_10: prayojakatāṃ bhajete / te tu prāyeṇa vākyasamāsagatatvenopalabhyamāne samāsasya vibhaktyaśravaṇād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:146_11: vidheyāvimarśatām utpādayataḥ / ata eva samāse 'pi yadi vibhaktiḥ śrūyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_0: tadā na vidheyāvimarśo yathā dāsyāḥ kāmuka ityādau / samāsas tu tatraikapadyādiprayojanatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_0: evaṃ ca saptaprakāraṃ tatpuruṣaṃ nirūpyāvyayībhāvaṃ nirūpayati - avyayībhāva iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_1: samāpaṃ viśeṣyaṃ prati dayitasyeti yad viśeṣaṇaṃ tat tasya samīpasyeti yojanā / madhyevyometi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_2: pāre madhye ṣaṣṭhyā vā ity avyayībhāvaḥ / sa ceti prakarṣaḥ / evam iyatā dvandvavarjaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_3: samāsavṛttir vicāritā / idānīm atideśamukhena kṛttaddhitavṛttir nirūpyate anenaivetyādinā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_4: vivakṣāviśeṣād ity akārapraśleṣaḥ / sarvaṃ kaṣatīti sarvakūlābhrakarīreṣu kaṣaḥ iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_5: khaco 'yaṃ viṣayaḥ / bibhartti yaḥ iti kukṣiṃbhariś ca iti nipātitasya kukṣimbhariśabdasyāyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_6: gocaraḥ / vidhun tud iti vidhvaruṣos tud iti khaśpratyayasthānam / śīrṣacchedam iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_7: śīrṣacchedād yac ca iti taddhitasya yat pratyayasyedaṃ padam / tair iti kaṣaṇādibhiḥ / sarvārthasyeti,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_0: vidhoś ceti vyakta sthitaḥ utkarṣam ādadhatāṃ prādhānyena vivakṣety atra sāmastyena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_1: yojanīyam / śīrṣacchedasya ceti utkarṣam ādadhataḥ prādhānyena vivakṣeti saṃbandhanīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_2: pūrvebhyo 'sya pṛthaṅnirdeśas taddhitavṛttiviṣayatvena bhinnajātīyatvāt / atra ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_4: krameṇa hetutvena draṣṭavyam / tad apīti caritam / kaṣaṇādikartṛṣv iti khalaudarikarāhuṣv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_5: ity arthaḥ / rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ saha iti / pūssarvayor dārisahoḥ iti khaco 'yaṃ viṣayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_6: daśarathasya hi prasūtir asāv iti tasyāpatyam iti stracpratyaye taddhite kṛte dāśarathiśabdasyāyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_7: gocaraḥ / vākye tu yady apīti tad uktam - kriyāpradhānaṃ guṇavad ekārthaṃ vākyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_8: iṣyate iti / anya iti vakṣyamānanyāyena śabdakṛtasāmarthyoktiḥ / sa iti pradhānabhāvenety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_9: atra nirdiṣṭaḥ pradhānabhāvaḥ śabdārthasāmarthyavivakṣākṛtānāṃ trayāṇām apīti śabdakṛtaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_10: śabdasaṃskāramahimnā niṣpannaṃ yathā karmadhārayād uttarapadasya / arthasāmarthyakṛtaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_11: vastuvṛttaniṣpāditaṃ yathā grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭītyādau grahādeḥ / tasya saṃskāryatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_12: vastutaḥ prādhānyam / vivakṣākṛtaṃ prayoktṛyadṛcchāpratipāditaṃ yad anyasyotkarṣāpakarṣādhānatayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_13: vivakṣitaṃ yathā rāmasya pāṇir asi ityādau rāmādeḥ / tatra triṣu prādhānyeṣu vivakṣākṛtam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_14: eva grādhānyaṃ pradhānam / tatkṛtatvāt kāvyārthacamatkārasya / ata evoktaṃ tayoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_15: samaśīrṣikābhāvād iti / tayor iti śabdārthasāmarthyakṛtayoḥ vivakṣākṛtena sahety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_16: arthāt / nanu pūrvaṃ śābdasyaiva prādhānyasya vaivakṣikatvam uktam anyasya tu vāstavatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_17: tat katham iha śābdavaivakṣikayor anyatvam ucyate / anyatve vā prādhānyatrayapratipādane
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_18: 'rthasāmarthyakṛtavivakṣākṭayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ / śabdakṛtād dhi prādhānyād anyadarthasāmarathyakṛtam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_19: ucyate / tena vivakṣākṛtasya uktatvāt / tat kim arthasāmarthyakṛtam avaśiṣyata iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_20: naiṣa doṣaḥ / pūrvaṃ hi śābdikaikagocarasya śābdikavivakṣākṛtatvād vaivakṣikatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_21: anyasya tu kavigocarasya vāstavatvaṃ tad evārthatvam / iha punaḥ sahṛdayaikagocarasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_22: kavivivakṣāvaśād vaivakṣikatvam ucyate / śābdikaikaviṣayasya śābdatvam ity apekṣābhedāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_23: pūrvas tāvan na virodhaḥ / yad api prādhānyatrayapratipādane 'rthasāmarthyavivakṣākṛtayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_24: bheda uktas tatrāyaṃ bhāvaḥ - iha śābdaṃ vāstavaṃ ceti dvividham eva prādhānyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_27: vāstavam eva vivakṣākṛta pratipāditam / tathā ca grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭīti vaidikaṃ vivakṣānapekṣam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_28: arthasāmarthyakṛtasyodāharaṇaṃ dattam iti viṣayavibhāgavyavasthiter na dvitīyo 'pi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_29: virodha iti samañjasaṃ sarvam / evaṃ kṛttaddhitavṛttiviṣaye ātideśikaṃ guṇapradhānabhāvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_30: vicārya samāsagatatvenaupadeśikaṃ prakṛtam anusandhatte tad idam atreti / sarūpāṇām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_31: iti dvandvasamāsasamānanyāyatvād ekaśeṣavṛttir api svīkṛtā / viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvābhāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:150_32: 'pīti samāsoṭṭaṅkanikāyāṃ prāyagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ prakāśayati / rūpaṃ ca kāntiś ca vidagdhatā ceti,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:151_1: gamyamānabhavanakriyāpekṣaṃ rūpādīnāṃ kartṛtvam / etena tatpuruṣasya kartrudāharaṇaprastāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:151_2: kartrādīnāṃ kārakāṇām anekeṣām iti yad uktaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:152_0: tat samīhitam. kaś ca kaś ceti / atraikaśeṣo na kṛtaḥ / kṛtaikaśeṣam iti kāv iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:152_1: prayoge / adhunā pradhānetarabhāvāpattiṃ darśayati yatra punar iti / bhavata iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:153_0: ripustrīṇām iti stanayugasya saṃbandhitveneti yojanā / ripustrīṇām iti samāsasyodāharaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:153_1: na cātra saṃbandhamātrād atiriktaṃ pratīyate / tadartham eveti upamotprekṣādayo 'py
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:153_2: alaṅkārāḥ upamotprekṣādīnām utkarṣam apakarṣaṃ vā pratipādayituṃ vidhīyante / anyathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:153_3: tadviracanaṃ niṣprayojanaṃ syāt / tau vidheyeti / utkarṣāpakarṣau / samāsa iti sā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:153_4: samāsa iti vivakṣā parāmṛśyate / vaidarbhīti yady api vāmanamate asamāsā pāñcālī,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:155_0: tathāpi matāntare viparyayaḥ sthita iti tadabhiprāyeṇehāsamāsā vaidarbhī kathitā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:155_1: kārikāmadhya eva saṃbandhamātrapratītau samāsasyodāharaṇam / ūrdhvākṣitāpeti / atra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_0: notkarṣāpakarṣau / vākyāt tūbhayam iti ubhayaṃ saṃbandharūpam utkarṣāpakarṣarūpaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_1: ca vastv ity arthaḥ / atrodāharaṇaṃ me yadaraya iti samāse hi madaraya iti syāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_2: na cāsmād atiśayaḥ pratītaḥ / nanu padād uttarapadayor yuṣmadasmadoḥ temayāv ekavacanasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_3: iti temayāv ādeśāv uktau / na cātra padāt paro 'smacchabdaḥ / evaśabdaḥ padam iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_4: cen na / tatprayoge nacavāhāhaivayukte iti niṣedhād bhinnavākyagatatvāc ca / samānavākye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_5: hi nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ / etenaiva vyatiriktaṃ padāntaraṃ pratyuktam / utkarṣamātram
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_6: eva śabdādeśaḥ atra ke cid āhuḥ vākye tāvad rasapratītir nirvyūḍhā / tām anupamaradayan
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_7: kāvye yady asādhuśabdo 'pi syān na tadā sthūlaḥ kaś cid doṣaḥ / kāvye hi rasapratītiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_8: pradhānam / tadanirvāhe kāvyam eva na syāt / apaśabdaprayoge tu lakṣaṇāsmaraṇamātram / tad uktaṃ -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:157: nīrasas tu prabandho yaḥ so 'paśabdo mahān kaveḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:159: iti / anye tv āhuḥ / bhavatu rasāpekṣayāpaśabdasya svalpadoṣatvaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160: tathāpi mahākavīnām apaśabdaprayogo mahān doṣaḥ / tenātra temeśabdau nipāteṣv iti tādṛśo vibhaktipratirūpako meśabdo nipāto,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_0: yathā ahantā ahaṃyur ityādāv ahaṃśabdaḥ / tataś ca nātra kaś cid viśeṣa iti / kiṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_1: sarvātmanā karaṇasya duṣṭatvam eva / nety āha kin tv iti / etasya samāsasya / antareṇeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_2: vīraraudrādeḥ samāsena prakāśyatvāt / vṛttaṃ vasantatilakādi / vṛttayaḥ kaiśikyādyāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_3: upanāgarikādyāś ca / kākuḥ kākvadhyāyalakṣito dhvanivikārarūpo vā / vācikābhinayo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_4: vāgvikārarūpo 'nubhāvaḥ / ardhāntāvadhir iti ślokāpekṣayā ardham antāvadhiḥ / nyūneti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_5: padyāpekṣayā nyūnaṃ rasābhivyaktihetutvam ity arthaḥ / yathā pūrvokta iti ūrdhvākṣitāpetyādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_6: samāso 'rdhāntāvadhiḥ kāryo nādhika ity anena vyāvartyasyādhikasya tad udāharaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_7: tasyeti padārthānāṃ parasparasaṃbandhaś cen na cchidyate tadā tasya samāsasya madhye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_8: vicchedo na kārya ity arthaḥ / avyabhicārād iti vidheyatvaṃ hi prādhānyāvinābhāvaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_9: sneham iti / atra pānādīnām prakāśanasya ca vidhyanuvādalopitvaikakartṛkāṇāṃ prādhānyabhāvo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_10: nāpasmṛtam atra ca yo 'yam iti yacchabdena dīpasya padārthasya parāmarśopakrame tattamasa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_11: iti tacchabdena vākyārthasya parāmarśo duṣṭa ity upapāditaṃ prāk / śaktiḥ sāmarthyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_12: āyudhabhedaś ca / tārakāḥ jyotīṃṣi daityaviśeṣaś ca tārakaḥ / adho nistejastvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_13: vāhanatvena ca / śikhīvahnir mayūraś ca / candrasya suvarṇasya saṃbandhī kāntāvabhāso
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_14: lasan dedīpyamāno yasmin / candrakāṇāṃ mecakānām avabhāso lasanaṃ sphurad yasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_15: andhakāre tamasi andhakārer harasya / guhaḥ kumāraḥ / apara iveti atrāparaśabdasāmarthyād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_16: bhūpe dvitīyaguhatvapratītau vastutas tadasaṃbhave tatsaṃbhāvanāyām utprekṣā / aparaśabdābhāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161_17: tu svasvarūpasthitasyaiva vāstavasya guhasya pratītāv iyam upamā syāt / evam apara iva pākaśāsano,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:162_0: maurvīṃ dvitīyām ityādau ca mantavyam / aharpater iti / aharādīnāṃ patyādiṣu iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:162_1: vacanād rephaḥ / atra dhāraṇādīnāṃ guṇabhāvaḥ / ādhārasya tu prādhānyam / karttā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:162_2: hi guṇakriyā niṣpādayan pradhānakriyām aidamparyeṇa niṣpādayati,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_0: na tu tāsv aidamparyam / yatra sarvāsv aidamparyaṃ tatra bhavaty eva sarvāsām ākhyātavācyatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_1: yathā saudhād ityādi / itarad aprādhānyam / ādyā pradhānabhūtā / aparā aprādhānyavatī /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_2: bahulagrahaṇam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam ity atra / kva cid ityādi / kva cit
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_3: pravṛttiḥ kva cid apravṛttir iti bahulagrahaṇaprayojanasya vyavasthitatvāt / utargeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_4: samāsavidhiḥ sāmānyarūpatvād utsargaḥ prādhānyādivivakṣānimittaś ca tatpratiṣedho
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_6: iti nyāyāt / kartum aśakya iti / avyavasthitaviṣayatvāt / yathā utsargasya ghañy
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_7: amanuṣye bahulam ity atra / pariśabde tv ayaṃ bhavati / parivādaḥ parīvāda iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_8: vivāda ity atra naiva bhavati / tadviṣayaḥ syād iti kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam ityādigatasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_9: bahulagrahaṇasya vidhyanuvādabhāvaviṣaye sāmarthyābhāvāt samāsābhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_10: tadabhiprāyam iti ācāryābhiprāyam / sāpekṣatāmidīti / ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣa ityādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_11: tat samarthagrahaṇam / etadvyāvṛttīti etacchabdena pradhānetarabhāvaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_13: arthaḥ / vidheyoddeśyeti uddeśyo 'trordhvanirdeśārhatvād anuvādyaḥ / yat teneti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_14: yacchabdaḥ pūrvārthasaṃbaddhaḥ / tenāpāraṇena / anabhidhānaṃ veti abhidhānalakṣaṇā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_15: hi kṛttaddhitasmāsā iti / samarthagrahaṇaṃ ca veti / caśabdo 'trātiriktaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:165: dṛṣṭir nāmṛtavarṣiṇī smitamadhuprasyandi vaktraṃ na tan nārdrārdraṃ hṛdayaṃ na candanarasasparśāni cāṅgāni vā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:167_0: cavāśabdārthayor ekatra virodhāt / khaṇḍiketi khaṇḍo granthasaṃbandhī na tu samasto
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:167_1: granthaḥ / sa vidyate yeṣām / anavagatatadabhiprāyair iti samarthagrahaṇaṃ praty
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:167_2: ācāryasya hi tair abhiprāyo nāgataḥ / abhidhānādhānoddhāreti / abhidhānānāṃ śabdānām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:167_3: ādhānam abhinavānāṃ nyasanam / uddhāraḥ pūrvakāṇām uddharaṇam / śālīnā adhṛṣṭā avicārakā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:167_4: ity arthaḥ / aparam apīti punaruktādikam / taccinteti / prādhānyetarabhāvena samāsāsamāsacintā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:167_5: prakaraṇeti / yatrārthaprakaraṇādinā śabdasya vācyo 'rthaḥ prakarṣāpakarṣādikam arthāntaraṃ prakāśayati,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:168_0: tatrābhipretārthavināśabhayāt samāso na karttavyaḥ / yathā rāmasya pāṇir asi iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:168_1: prakaraṇaśabdādisakha iti pāṭhe śabdasyānyasya sannidhir iti svīkṛtam / yadā prakaraṇakākvādisakha iti pāṭhaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_0: tadā kākugrahaṇena svaraviśeṣa ucyate yaḥ kālo vyaktisvarādayaḥ iti kāvyagatatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_1: svīkṛtaḥ / evaṃ prasaktānuprasaktikayā samāsagatatvena tadatideśena samagrapravṛttigatatvenāpi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_2: guṇapradhānabhāvavivakṣāṃ mahatā prapañcena parighaṭayya prakṛtodāraṇe ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣagatatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_3: yojayitum āha ittham avasthita iti / ambikāyā upādānam iti saṃbandhaḥ / tat kim iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:170_0: kesarigataprakarṣapratipādanaṃ vā phalam / ādye pakṣe nirdiṣṭacamatkārasambhāvanā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:170_1: dvitīye tu samāsānupapattir iti tātparyam / vivakṣitapadaṃ camatkārātiśayapadena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:170_2: yojanīyam / tasyā ity ambikāyās sakāśāt / jātyantaraṃ viśiṣṭāvāntarakesarijātiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:170_3: tayāvacchinno viśiṣṭaḥ / viśiṣṭa eveti lokottaraḥ / mohantv iti harer vihaṅgamo garuḍaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:170_4: moham ajñānaṃ hantv ity arthaḥ / garuḍajātyavacchinna iti / saugatadṛśā garuḍānāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:170_5: bahutvād iti bhāvaḥ / vihaṅgamaviśeṣatvaṃ tu jātyādivailakṣaṇyāt / svābhiprāyāviṣkaraṇam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:170_6: iti / sādṛśyamūlayāprastutapraśaṃsayeti bhāvaḥ / tasyāś ceti tacchabdena sarasvatī
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:170_7: parāmṛṣṭā / sarasvatyā ambikā pratibimbam ātmanaś ca kesarīty arthaḥ / dvitīyapakṣa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:171_0: samāsād asāv iti ambikākesariśabdād unmiṣaty eva sa camatkāra ity arthaḥ / udayāstamayeti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:171_1: vṛttau camatkārasyāstamaya vākye udaya iti cūlikākrameṇa yogaḥ / upadarśitam eva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:171_2: prāg iti udāharaṇapratyudāharaṇapradarśanadvāreṇa / iṣṭaṃ hīti abhipretasyāprāptir yā,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:172: sā codanārhā iṣṭam etan na sidhyatīti / yat tu nābhipretaṃ tasyāprāptir bhūṣaṇaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_0: na tu dūṣaṇam ity arthaḥ / asmābhir asāv iti asau camatkāraḥ / sā bhrāntir eveti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_1: nirvikalpavikalpabhedena dvividhā bhrāntiḥ / tatrādyā timirādyupaplutendriyasya dvicandrādipratītirūpā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_2: dvitīyā tv abhimānarūpā śuktirajatādipratītisvarūpā / seti camatkārāvagatiḥ / vyākhyāvākyād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_3: eveti ambikāyāḥ kesarīti samāsavivaraṇavākyāt / teṣām iti pratītivaicitryānabhyupagamavādinām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_4: tatrāropiteti tatra samāse śuktisthānīye rajatam ivāropitāvāstavīty arthaḥ / udayāstamayapakṣau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_5: kramād vākyasamāsagatau / udyoga iti / saṃrambhapadaṃ nirasyodyogapadakaraṇaṃ prakramyamānodyuktavat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_6: padakramābhedāya / yo 'sāv ity adaḥśabdaḥ prasiddhiparāmarśakaḥ yacchabdapratinirdeśasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_7: tacchabdena kariṣyamāṇatvāt / pratipāditeti / ārtho hi kevalatacchabdasya prayoganibandhana
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_8: upakramopasaṃhārakramaḥ pratipādita eva / rajaś chaleneti / chalevaśabdaprayoge sāpahnaveyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_9: utprekṣā / kevalacchalaśabdaprayoge 'py apahnutiḥ / kevalevaśabdaprayoge ca sambhāvanapratītāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_10: utprekṣā / dvayaprayoge tu śabalā pratītiḥ / na cātrāpahnutyutprekṣayoḥ saṅkaraḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_11: utprekṣā hy apahnutyavinābhāvinī / so 'pahnavaḥ kva cid garbhīkṛto yathā nakhakṣatānīva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:175: kin tu sambhāvayāmi nakhakṣatānīti pratīteḥ / kva cit tu śabdena pratipādyate yathā adhyāruroheveti / evaṃ cāsyā apahnutyavinābhāvinyā apahnutibādhakatvaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_0: na tayā saha saṅkaraḥ / bhinnavākyatāyām eveti / tatra hi vidhyanuvādabhāva āñjasyena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_1: krameṇa pratīyate / tad eva veti viśeṣaṇam / tac ca vidhyanuvādabhāvavivakṣāyāṃ vidheyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_2: anyatreti / utkarṣāparṣayor vidheyatvasya cābhāve / kāmacāra iti samāsāsamāsayoḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_3: tadartham iti utkarṣādiviṣaye samāsaniṣedhārtham / sāpekṣeti sāpekṣam asamarthaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_4: bhavatīty etāvanmātrapratītaye / pitroḥ svateveti yathā pitarau vandanīyāv iti nityasaṃbandhanyāyād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:177: tadvat sāpekṣāṇām anabhidhānākhyena nyāyena samāsābhāvaḥ pratyeṣyate / svatā ātmīyatvam iva / sā doṣaprakāranivṛttiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:178_0: adhunā svotkarṣaśālitāprakaṭanārthaṃ svapariśramaṃ piṇḍīkṛtya ślokena darśayitum
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:178_1: āha kāvyakāñcaneti / kāvyam eva parīkṣaṇīyatvāt suvarṇaṃ tatra parīkṣāsthānaṃ nikaṣopalam ātmānaṃ manyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_0: na punar uktakrameṇa parāmarthas san nikaṣopalaḥ / ata eva kuntakeneti khyātasyāpy
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_1: ulluṇṭhanavacanam / śloka eṣa iti / yaḥ sarvasāratayā pradarśitas tatreyatī dūṣaṇavṛṣṭir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_2: muktā / tatrānyasya granthasya kā gaṇeneti sūcitam / nidarśitaḥ sthālīpulākanyāyenodāhṛtaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_3: atra śloke vakṣyamāṇaitadīyanyāyānusāreṇa kaṣeṇa niyamena kāñcanākṣepāt kāñcanapadaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_5: vidheyatvāt samāsakaraṇaṃ vidheyāvimarśadūṣitaṃ ke cid ācakṣate vicakṣaṇāḥ / tattvenaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_6: granthakṛtā svakṛtiṣv ayantrita ityādinā dattottaram eva / asya ca vidheyāvimarśasyānantetaraprasiddhalakṣyapātitvenāsmābhir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_7: nāṭakamīmāṃsāyāṃ sāhityamīmāṃsāyāṃ ca teṣu teṣu sthāneṣu prapañcaḥ pradarśita iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:180_0: evaṃ vidheyāvimarśaṃ prakāravaicitryeṇa lakṣayitvā prakramabhedaṃ lakṣayitum āha
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:180_2: utkhāto viṣamonnataḥ pradeśaḥ / enam iti śabdārthavyavahāram / tadviṣayabhāvaḥ prakramabhedaviṣayatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:180_3: anabhibhāṣaṇaṃ tatkartṛkabhāṣaṇābhāvaḥ / evam anālapanaṃ jñeyam / analam asamarthā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:180_4: vidhyanuvādabhāvaprakāratopagamād iti prakāraḥ sādṛśyam / upakrāntaṃ hy anuvādasthānīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:180_5: nirvāhakaṃ ca vidheyaprakhyam / tatra spaṣṭaṃ vidheyānuvādyaprakāram udāharati yatheti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181: tadā jāyante guṇā yadā tais sahṛdayair gṛhyante /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:183: evam eva janas tasyā dadāti kapolopamāyāṃ śaśibimbam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:184: paramārthavicāre punaś candraś candra iva varākaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_0: utkarṣāpakarṣamātreti kamalānām utkarṣavivakṣā / candrasya punar apakarṣavivakṣā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_1: ata evodāharaṇadvayaṃ dattam / prakramabhedaprakāra iti prakāro 'tra viśeṣaḥ / paryāyaprakrameti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_2: candraśabdārthasya śaśiśabdena paryāyāntaranirdeśo na yukto vakṣyamāṇaprakramabhedaprasaṅgāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_3: na caivam iti tenaiva śabdenopasaṃhāra ity arthaḥ / tayor iti prakramabhedapunaruktayoḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_4: asyeti prakramābhedasya parāmarśaḥ / tatra hi yathoddeśaṃ pratinirdeśe na paunaruktyam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186: aikarasyena pratītiprasaraṇāt / uddeśyapratinirdeśyabhāvo na paunaruktyasya viṣayaḥ / yathā -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187: kṣāmāṅgyaḥ kṣatakomalāṅguligaladraktaiḥ sadarbhāḥ sthalīḥ pādaiḥ pātitayāvakair iva galadbāṣpāmbudhautānanāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_0: iti / atra galacchabdadvayaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ yathoddeśaṃ pratinirdeśo 'sya viṣaya iti samañjasam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_1: [tayor iti prakramābhedapaunaruktyayoḥ / asyeti prakramābhedasya parāmarśaḥ /] nanu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_2: vrajataḥ kva tāta! vajasīty atra vrajinā prakrame vajinā ca nirvāhe kathaṃ na prakramabhedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_3: vajatir api dhātur asti / vaja vraja gatāv iti pāṭhād ity āśaṅkyoktaṃ vrajata iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_4: uditaṃ śiśuneti uditam ity asya viśeṣaṇaṃ paricayagatārtham iti / asphuṭam iti ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_5: bhāve cātra pratyayaḥ / kāryārthaṃ pathi gacchataḥ paścān nāmodīraṇaṃ viruddham iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_6: śiśunā lalitavacasā nāmany udīrite jananyāsya bhartsanaṃ kṛtam iti tato 'sya manyur
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_7: vivṛddha ity atra tātparyārthaḥ / evaṃ dhāturūpāyāḥ prkṛte prakramabhedaṃ pradarśya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_8: saṃprati prātipadikarūpāyās tasyā madhye ca sarvanāmādīnāṃ prakāravaicitryeṇa taṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_9: darśayati sarvanāmeti / kva cit punaḥ pustakeṣu prakṛtiprakramabhedād anantaraṃ pratyayaprakramabhedodāharaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_10: tat paścāt sarvanāmaprakramabhedanirdeśo dṛśyate / tatra ca prkṛter anantaraṃ pratyayasyaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_11: nirdeśa ucita iti sa eva kathita iti saṅgatiḥ / tataḥ paraṃ prakṛtiviśeṣāṇāṃ pratyayaviśeṣāṇāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_12: tatsamudāyānāṃ ca tatprakramabhedo nirūpayiṣyate / uktarītyeti / yas tv ekavākye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_13: kartṛtvenokto yaś cedamādibhir ity atroktena krameṇety arthaḥ / nanu yacchabdena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_14: prakrame tacchabdenedamādibhir vā prakrame yacchabdena vā katham upasaṃhāra ity āha
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_15: na caivam iti / anyonyāpekṣe iti / yattador nityābhisaṃbandha ity uktam / evaṃ tacchabdādūraviprakṛṣṭārtheṣv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_16: idamādiṣu prāg ukte yo 'vikalpam ityādau jñeyam / teneti prakṛtopasaṃhāraḥ / idamādīnāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_17: parasparāvāntaravaicitrye 'pi sthūladṛṣṭyā ekārthatvam / atra hīti atra hi kartṛviśeṣaṇadvāreṇaikasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_18: hetutvam aparasya sākṣād iti prakramabhedaḥ / yaśodhigantum iti atra hi tṛtīyātumunoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_19: pratītivaiṣamyajanakatvam / vāśabdasyeti / vakṣyati hi tulyakakṣyatayā yatra padārthāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_20: iti / apatyavato 'pīti yuktaḥ pāṭha iti / atra ke cit samarthayante - viśeṣataḥ snihyanto
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_21: dṛśyante tat putraśabdasyāpatyaviśeṣavācitve apatyaśabdasya ca sāmānyavācitve 'pi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_22: sarvanāmavaśād viśeṣaparyavasāne bhavaty eva prakṛtārthaparipoṣa iti / tad etad asya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189: yasmād dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikabhāvenātra vākyārthadvayam upanibaddham / tatra ca dvayor bimbapratibimbabhāvena nirdeśo yujyate / dṛṣṭānte cātra sāmānyopakramaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_0: puṣpaśabdasya sāmānyavācitvāc cūtaśabdasya viśeṣābhidhāyakatvād / viśeṣasya cotkṛṣṭatayaivātṛptiviṣayatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_1: dārṣṭāntike aniṣṭam viśeṣopakramaḥ / sāmānyopasaṃhāraḥ / sarvanāmavaśād vā viśeṣāntaranirdeśo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_2: nyāyyaḥ / sthitapāṭhe putraśabdasya viśeṣavācitvam apatyaśabdasya sāmānyavācino viśeṣaparyavasānam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_3: yadā tv apatyavato 'pīti pāṭhas tadāsya sāmānyopakramo viśeṣopasaṃhāraḥ / dvitīyasyāpatyaśabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_4: sarvanāmasaṃbandhena viśeṣaparyavasānād yathaikīyamate tasminn adrau kati cid balety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_5: atra / api śabdasyārthasaṅgatiś ced dṛśyeva bhrājate / yasya naivāpatyasaṃbandhas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_6: tasya mā bhūt kanyāyām ekasyām atṛptiḥ yasya tv anekāpatyayogas tasya katham ekasminn
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_7: apatye snigdhatvam iti vismayaḥ / etadartha evāpiśabdo jīvati / atṛptikāraṇatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_8: ca kanyāyāḥ parasamarpaṇīyatvena / guṇagauraveṇa ca snehapātratā / etadartham asyāś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_9: cūtena pratibimbanam / tad ittham apatyavato 'pīty eṣa eva pāṭhaḥ śreyān / samāsānupapattīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_10: adhikaṃ na tu taddhānir iti nyāyena guṇāntaralābha ity arthaḥ / varaṃ kṛteti / kṛtāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_11: śikṣitāḥ santo dhvastā naṣṭā guṇā yasya / amaṇir avidyamānamaṇir alaṅkāraḥ / upalaśabdenātra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_12: maṇir eva vivakṣitaḥ / tannātra maṇiśabdaḥ prayukta iti paryāyaprakramabhedatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_13: kham iveti / haṃsaś candra iva candra iva haṃsa iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ / maghona indrasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_14: sute 'rjune / vīryaṃ ca vidvatsv iti / vīryavedanaṃ cety eva hetutvena vivakṣitam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_15: samuccayo vikalpo veti / vikalpo yaśo 'dhigantum ity atrodāhṛtaḥ / samuccayasya tv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:191_16: idaṃ vīryaṃ cety udāharaṇam / vidvatsu vīryaṃ tanaye iti pāṭhe na vedanaṃ hetutvena vivakṣitam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_0: api tu vastusvarūpapratipādanaparatvenety ayaṃ manyate / evaṃ ca vidvatsv iti viśeṣaṇasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_1: nairarthakyam āpadyata iti nānena vicāritam / duṣkūlabhāva iti / sāmānādhikaraṇyenopakrame
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_2: vaiyadhikaraṇyena pratinirdeśaḥ prakramabhedāvahaḥ atra caturthe pāde / kapālam evāmalaśekharaśrīr
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_3: ity atra kapālānāṃ bahutve vācye yad ekatvavacanam amalaśekharaśrīr ity atra ca śekharamātre
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_4: dharmiṇi vaktavye yacchekharaśrīr iti dharmavacanaṃ tad anupapannam eva gantavyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_5: evaṃ ca pūrvokteṣu vakṣyamāṇeṣu codāharaṇeṣu saṃbhavann api vicāro granthavistarabhayān
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_6: na niravaśeṣatayā kṛta iti tatraivābhiyogaḥ kartavyaḥ / tadupetam iti / svaśabdena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_7: sarvanāmnā vā nirdeśas tulyaphala iti pratipādayiṣyamāṇatvāt / bhagavati yuṣmatprasādeneti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_8: anena nyāyena paśyata mātaḥ iti vārttike dharmakīrteḥ prayogaḥ pratyuktaḥ / prādhānyābhāvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_9: ity uktam iti / yatraikakartṛkānekā prādhānyetarabhāk kriyā ity atra / anenijur akṣālayan /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_10: jakṣur akhādan / bisaprasūnaṃ padmam / nejanādāv iti liṭā bhūtānadyatanaparokṣaprakrame
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_11: anenijur iti tu bhūtānadyatanena nirvāhaḥ / tathā dhṛtavikāsīty atra bhūtamātre ktapratyaya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_12: ity atrāpi kālaprakramabhedaḥ / tatropari tiṅantaprakramabhedo dvitīyo 'tra na sthitaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_13: evaṃ cehādigrahaṇena dhṛtavikāsīti gṛhyate / anenijur iti atra vikacam asya dadhuḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_14: prasūnam iti samādhānaṃ na kṛtaṃ prakārāntareṇa samarthayiṣyamāṇatvāt / yadi vetyādināmuṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_15: prakramabhedaṃ nirākaroti / ajayad iti atra parokṣo 'pi jayo darśanārhatvāt parokṣatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_16: na vivakṣita iti liṭprayogo na kṛtaḥ / vidyamānasyāsyāvivakṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntam āha anudarā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:192_17: kanyeti / na hi kasyāś cit kanyāyā udarābhāvaḥ kṛśatvāt punas tad api vivakṣyate / evaṃ ca -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:193: abhūdabhūmiḥ pratipakṣajanmanāṃ bhiyāṃ tanūjas tapanadyutir diteḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:194: yam indraśabdārthaniṣūdanaṃ harer hariṇyapūrvaṃ kaśipuṃ pracakṣate // ityādeḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:195: tāta tvaṃ nijatejasaiva gamitaḥ svargaṃ yadi svasti te kiṃ tv anyena hṛtā vadhūr iti kathāṃ mā sakhyur agre kṛthāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:196: rāmo 'haṃ yadi rāghavas tad akhilaṃ vrīḷānamatkandharaṃ sārdhaṃ bandhujanena sendravijayī vaktā svayaṃ rāvaṇaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:197_0: ityādeś ca mahataḥ kāvyapravāhasya na kiṃ cid duṣṭatvam / arthasyeti tadbhāvo 'rthatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:197_1: sattā atadbhāva asattvam / yatreti pūrvārdhaśeṣaḥ / yatheti / na prakramabheda ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:197_2: anvayaḥ / tatra kālaviśeṣo darśitaḥ / yathā bhūtasya bhāvinaś ca kālasyādyatanānadyatanatve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:197_3: parokṣāparokṣatve ca vaivakṣike eveti / te śīlādayo 'rthāḥ ā kves tacchīlataddharmatatsādhukāriṣu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:197_4: ity atra nirdiṣṭāḥ / teṣāṃ ca vaivkṣike sattvāsattve / evaṃ ca kva cit tācchīlikādipratyayaprayoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:199: agṛdhnur ādade so 'rtham asaktaḥ sukham anvabhūt //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:200_0: ity atrāgṛdhnur iti tācchīlyādyarthapratyayaprayoge 'py atrasta ity atrātrasnur ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:200_1: akaraṇe 'pi na duṣṭatvam atrasnur iti vā nirdeśe agṛdhnur iti nirdoṣam eva / kartuḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:200_2: phalavattā kartrabhiprāyatvam / tad api vaivakṣikam eva / evaṃ ca dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭim adho
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:200_3: dadāti kurute nālāpam ābhāṣitā ity atra yadi kartrabhiprāyatvaṃ kriyāphalasya,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:201_0: tadā dadātīti parasmaipadānupapattiḥ / na cet tadā kuruta ity atra parasmaipadaprasaṅga
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:201_1: iti prakramabhedaparyanuyogo niravakāśa eva / evam anyatra boddhavyam / tena te iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:201_2: te kālaviśeṣādayaḥ tena vivakṣāprayuktatvena kāraṇena na darśitā ity arthaḥ / gāhantām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:201_3: iti / atra kartur ākhyātenābhidhānaṃ karmaṇaś cānabhidhānaṃ prakrāntaṃ visrabdhair
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:201_4: ity anyathākṛtam iti kārakaprakramabhedaḥ / vihṛtiṃ viharaṇaṃ bhaṅgibhājanatvam ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:201_5: arthaḥ / vivṛtam iti pāṭhe vistaraśālitvam ity arthaḥ / ratau vigraho virodhaḥ stanatair
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:201_6: vyavahitas tatprasādād virodhasya kartum aśakyatvāt / vitene iti bhāve pratyayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:201_7: stanitāni vitatībhūtānīty arthaḥ / śābdaḥ prakramabheda iti śabdaviṣayatvāc chābdaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:201_8: śābdaprakramabheda iti tu prakṛtiprakramabhedasyānukrameṇa ye paṭhanti taiḥ śābdaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:201_9: cārthaś cottaro grantho nālocita ity upekṣyam etat / saṅgamabhūṣeti / atra buhuvrīhāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:201_11: prakramabhedaḥ / evam ārthaḥ prakramabheda ity atra prathamaprakrāntabhidyamānārthaviṣayatvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:201_12: ārtha iti vyākhyeyam / dhṛtavikāsīti pūrvaṃ kālaprakaraṇenodāhṛtam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:203: tiṅantagatatvenāpy ūhyate / na hīyam ārthaḥ prakramabheda iti atrodāharaṇadvitayaṃ dattaṃ mattateti samatayeti / tatra mattatety atra saṅgamabhūṣety ārthena krameṇa prakramaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:204_0: bhūṣayatīty atra tu śābdarūpatayā pratinirdeśa ity ārthaḥ prakramabhedaḥ / kiṃ tu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:204_1: tadvapus tad api cārutaratvam iti pāṭhaḥ sthitaparipāṭhyānuguṇyābhāvān na nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:204_2: cārutā sa khalu sāpi śarīram iti tu pāṭhaḥ śreyān / evaṃ ca dayitasaṅgatir eṣety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:205: na punar āsām iti pāṭhaḥ / tatra hi mattatā kena śabdena parāmṛśyate / samatayety etat prāyeṇādarśeṣu śābdaprakramabhede udāharaṇatayā dṛśyate / ārtha prakramabhedaprastāve vā?
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:206_0: ca anantarodāharaṇayor ādyam āhitaviparyayam iti pāṭhaḥ / etac cāyuktaṃ yojanagranthe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:206_1: varuṇasyārthaprakrama iti granthavirodhāt / kiṃ tu niyamayann iti vidagdhamanyatayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:207_0: varuṇenaiva tat saṃbaddham ity atra pramāṇābhāvāt / na hi varuṇasyānyopasarjanatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:207_1: sthitasya svātantryam asti / tasya naivaṃvidhasaṃbandhaḥ puṣṭatvaṃ dhatte / ārthaprakramabhedaprastāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:207_2: idam evodāharaṇam āhitaviparyayam iti pāṭhaḥ śreyān / parihṛtau bhavata iti / vibhaktiprakramabhedacaśabdayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:207_3: dvitvād dvivacanam / caśabdasyobhayathā duṣṭatā ca / caśabdasya ca samuccayo viṣayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:207_4: tadbhāvaḥ uktaḥ / yena tulyakakṣyatvābhāvākyatvena nivāritaḥ / prakramabhedas tv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:207_5: asatām ity asamuccetavyanikaṭaprayogāt / sa hi niyamanād ity asyānantaraṃ paṭhanīyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:207_6: loṣṭasaṃcāra ekaikasya bhedasya bhedāntaraiḥ saha saṃyojanaprakārākhyo gaṇanāviśeṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:207_7: prakṛtipratyayayor iti laghuśabdaḥ prakṛtiḥ / tasyāṃ guruśabdena bhedaḥ / guruśabde
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:208_0: yo laghuśabde na prayuktaḥ / tatpratyayasya ca pratinirdeśo na kṛta iti pratyayaprakramabhedo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:208_1: 'pi / abhinavapāṭhe tu tatpratyayarahitasyaiva laghuśabdasya pratinirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:209_0: so 'nudeśe vaiparītyād na kṛta iti pratīter aikyasya vigamād duṣṭatvam / tava kusumaśaratvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:209_1: iti / idaṃ kramaprakramabhedodāharaṇaṃ na yuktaṃ cūlikākramasyaivātrocitatvam / tathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:209_2: hy uddeśaḥ / smaraṃ prati sāṃmukhyenābhidhānaṃ vihāya nenduṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ pratyayathārthajñānam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:209_3: ucitam iti smarasya tāvat prathamanirdeśo nyāyyaḥ / anudeśe tv idaṃ viṣayaṃ tyaktvā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:209_4: na prāsaṅgikena vākyārthaparisamāptiḥ śobhate iti pāryavasānikena smareṇaiva saṃmukhīkriyamāṇena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:209_5: vākyārthaḥ parisamapanīya iti pāṭhakramāpekṣayā cūlikākrama eva sahṛdayahṛdayarañjaka
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:209_6: iti kuśāgrīyadhiṣaṇair nipuṇaṃ nirūpaṇīyam etat / tathā ca yuṣmadasmadoḥ padasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:209_7: padāt ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayor vānnāvau iti cūlikākrameṇa vyavahāro dṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:210: upādāyāpi ye heyās tān upāyān pracakṣate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:212_0: iti / prakramabheda iti / prakramabhedaviṣayasya vidhyanuvādabhāvaprakāratvāt prakramabhedo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:212_1: 'py upacārād vidhyanuvādaprakāra ity arthaḥ / anenaiva nyāyena śābdaś cārthaś ceti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:212_2: prakramabhedasya bhedadvayaṃ śābdārthaviṣayatvād boddhavyam / śabdabhedam iti / ekaśabdābhedatvābhidheyatvenārthasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:212_4: prakāreṇa vidhyanuvādabhāvaviṣayatvam / kāvyagatatvena hi cintā prastutā / na ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213_0: sahitayoḥ śabdārthayos tatra prayogāt / sāhityaṃ tulyakakṣyatvenānyūnānatiriktatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213_1: astv evam iti sāmānyena prakramabhedābhyupagamo viśeṣe tu paryanuyoga iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213_2: prakramabhedaniyamaṃ pratīti hṛdayaṅgamaḥ pāṭhaḥ / yadbhedābhedābhyām iti hi yacchabdena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213_3: prakramaḥ parāmṛśyate / prakramabhedaniyamaṃ pratīti tu pāṭhe yadbhedābhedābhyām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213_4: iti prakramasyaivoddhṛtasya yathākathaṃ cit parāmarśo vyākhyeyaḥ / śuci bhūṣayatīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213_5: atra bhūṣayatīti śābdaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ prakrāntam alaṅkriyetyādāv ārthena rūpeṇa pratinirdiṣṭam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213_6: atra ca paryāyaprakramabhedaḥ sthito 'pi sāṃprataṃ na cintitaḥ śabdārthaprakramabhedacintanaprastāvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213_7: atra vibhāgasyaiveti / atra vety arthād upameyam tadabhisaṃbandhaḥ śabdābhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213_8: viparyayād iti sākṣāc chabdasaṃbandhābhāvāt / udāharaṇadvaye śuci bhūṣayati iti cārutā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213_9: vapur iti ca / yādṛśam iti sthitapāṭhābhiprāyeṇānaucityaṃ dattapāṭhāśayena tv aucityam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213_10: ity arthaḥ / tacchabdenānye parāmṛśyante / sādṛśyam eveti / tadā yacchabdasya napuṃsakatā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213_11: syāt / tasmāt surārivety atra parāmṛśyata iti avivekākṣamaprajñatvāt / tadapahṛteti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213_12: bhaṅgibhaṇitivaicitryaṃ parāmṛṣṭam / utkaṭena bhaṇitivaicitryeṇa varṇanīyam ācchāditam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213_13: ity arthaḥ / tad uktaṃ vakroktikṛtā laukikālaṅkārān upamānīkṛtya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:216: iti / aprādhānyaṃ syād iti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - yadi śabdavyāpāraviṣayasya prādhānyam arthavyāpāraviṣayasya cāprādhānyam iti vyavasthā,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:217: tadā trividhasya pratīyamānasya parair dhvanyatvena vyapanirdidiṣṭasyāsmābhir anumeyatvenopapāditasyāprādhānyaṃ prasajyeta tasyārthavyāpāraviṣayatvāt,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:218_0: śabdavyāpāraviṣayatvasya dūṣitatvāt / iṣyate ca prādhānyam / tat katham iyaṃ prādhānyāprādhānyapratītir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:218_1: ghaṭata iti / cakrābhighātetyādau ca paryāyokte samāsoktivad gamyamānasyaiva prādhānyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:218_2: na vācyasyety upapāditaṃ prāk / ekābhighāta iti hayagrīvavadhe pāṭhaḥ sthitaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:219: sudarśanasya pulliṅgasya prakrāntatvād ya ity anena parāmarśāt / tat tv anavabudhya cakraṃ yadi parāmṛśyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:220_0: tadā yacchabdasya napuṃsakatā syāt / tan murārir evātra parāmṛśyata ity āśayena cakrābhighāteti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:220_1: paṭhanti / na tv ayaṃ tatra prastāvaḥ / tadapekṣayaiva prādhānyam aprādhānyaṃ ceti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:220_2: iha gamakam apradhānam upāyatvāt / gamyaṃ pradhānam upeyatvāt / tena pratīyamānasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:220_3: gamyatvāt prādhānyavyavahāraḥ / na pratītyapekṣayeti / śabdenārthena ca yā pratītis,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:221_0: tadapekṣayā na prādhānyāprādhānyavyavahāra ity arthaḥ / tayas tv iha gamyagamakabhāvaviviktaviṣayatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:221_1: cintā kṛtā / tadapekṣayaiva ceti / vācyasyāpi yaḥ śābdatvena prādhānyavyavahārayogas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:221_2: tasyāpi / tadapekṣayā gamyagamakatvāpekṣayā / kva cid yatra pratīyamānasadbhāvas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:221_3: tatrāprādhānyam ity arthaḥ / vācyaṃ hi pratīyamānaṃ prati gamakatvena vyavasthitaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:221_4: tena tadapekṣatvenāprādhānyam iti tātparyam / vicitrā bhaṅgibhiṇitaya iti yathā bhaṭṭabāṇasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:221_5: teṣu teṣu sthāneṣu / abhibhūyamānatvād iti / yad uktaṃ dhvanikṛtā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:223_0: iti / vākyabhedāc ceti vākyāntarāpekṣayā hi vākyāntarasya bhaṅgibhaṇitivaicitryam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:223_1: ity aṃśena pratītivaidūryān na prakramabhedadoṣaṃ prakāśayati / nyāyasiddhatvād iti /
