GK16ruvyavivya_pu:223_2: nyāyo 'tra bhaṇitivaiṣamyam / kāraṇabhedasyāpīti na kevalaṃ pratītibhedo bhedahetuḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:225: kāraṇabhedaḥ punar utpattyapekṣayeti viśeṣaḥ / tad uktam -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:226: ayam eva bhedo bhedahetur vā bhāvānāṃ yo 'yaṃ viruddhadharmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇabhedaś ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:227_1: sa ceti prakramabhedaḥ / śābdaś cārthaś ceti pūrvaṃ prakṛtyādiprakramabhedavilakṣaṇau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:227_2: śābdārthaprakramabhedau lakṣitāv udāhṛtau ca / adhunā vācyapratīyamānārthāpekṣayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:227_4: uktāv iti viśeṣo boddhavyaḥ / vastuprakramabheda iti / vastu varṇanīyaṃ yathā varṇayituṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:227_5: prakrāntaṃ tasya tathā nirvāhābhāvād vastuprakramabhedaḥ / bhedeneti avayavasaṃbandhitvenety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:227_6: arthaḥ / prathame hi pāde avayavina eva svarūpeṇa varṇanaṃ prakrāntam ity avayavisaṃbandhitvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:227_7: nirvāhaṇaṃ doṣaḥ / ubhayatrāpīti avayavivarṇane avayavavarṇane ca / tat svarūpaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:227_8: nāyikāsvarūpam / aṅgena ity āmantraṇam / patatu adhastāt gacchatu / sādṛśyapratipādaneti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:227_9: dvicandram iti hi pāṭhe vadanena saha candro nabhaso dvicandratām āpādayati / tac
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:227_10: ca vadanacandrayoḥ sādṛśyamūlam iti vyatirekaprakrame sādṛśyanirvāhāt prakramabhedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:227_11: vastusargapaunaruktyasyeti punaruktavastuvirasa ity atra hi punaruktavastubhir virasa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:227_12: iti vyākhyāne sādṛśyena nirvāhaḥ kṛtaḥ / vyatirekeṇa ca prakrama iti doṣa evāyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:227_13: vimukha iti / ke cit punaruktavastuṣu virasaḥ punaruktāni vastūni na karotīti vyākhyānena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:227_14: vyatirekanirvāhād yathāsthitapāṭhaṃ samarthayāṃ cakre / arthadoṣāṇām iti prakramātikramarūpāṇām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:228: tapena varṣāḥ śaradā himāgamo, vasantalakṣmyā śiśiraḥ sametya ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:229: prasūnakṛtyaṃ dadataḥ sadartavaḥ pure 'sya vāstavyakuḍumbitāṃ dadhuḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:230: atra hi strīpuruṣayugalatrayarūpatayā ṛtūnāṃ varṇane prastute strīrūpāṇām ṛtunāṃ tṛtīyāsaṃbandhād aprādhānye vivakṣite yat tapena varṣā ity atra viparyayaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:231: kṛte vā tathā nirdeśe śaradā himāgama ityādau yad anyathākaraṇaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:232_0: sa prakramabheda eva / yadi paraṃ strīpuṃsayor atra yena krameṇa prakramaḥ tasyānyathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:232_1: nirvāhāt kramaprakramabhedam imaṃ vidmaḥ / tena pūrvaṃ kramaprakramabhedasyedam evodāharaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:232_2: deyam / tena varaṃ ghanaśriyoṣṇaḥ śaradā himāgamaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ / kartṛprakramabhedo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:232_3: 'pīti / yatra yuṣmadasmadarthagataṃ kartṛtvaṃ śeṣe 'tra cetane 'cetane vā vaktrā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:233_0: tatra kartur anyasyāropaś cārutvāya vyatyāso guṇa evety arthaḥ / tayor iti / yatra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:233_1: kartṛvyatyāsaprakramabhedayoḥ / na prakaraṇāvasita iti / yuṣmadasmadarthasya hi kva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:233_2: cit kartṛtvaṃ prakaraṇādyavasitaṃ na śabdenābhidhātuṃ prakrāntam iti nāyaṃ prakramabhedadoṣasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:233_3: viṣayaḥ / anyatrāropyaivam uktam iti śeṣatvena vivakṣite rāmabhadre / evam uttaratra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:233_4: bhārgave vaṭau cānyatvaṃ yojanīyam / nanu yuṣmadasmadarthasya cetanatvāt tadapekṣayācetanasyaivānyatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:233_5: ucitam iti kathaṃ cetanasyaivānyatvam ity āha - dvividho hīti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:234_0: api tu yuṣmadasmadarthatvāpekṣayaiva / yuṣmadasmadarthau ca kramāt saṃbodhyamānavastuniṣṭhaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:234_1: parabhāvo 'smitākhyā pratyaktā ca / tataś ca tadapekṣayā śeṣasyānyatvam / tasya ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:234_2: cetanatvācetanatvād dvaividhyam iti na virodhaḥ kaś cit / paraśunā candrahāsa iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:234_3: krameṇa dvayor api yuṣmadasmadarthayor acetanaviṣayakartṛtāvyatyāsa udāharaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:234_4: bho laṅkeśvara iti / atra rāmaḥ svayaṃ yācata iti asmadarthakartṛtvasya cetanaviṣayavyatyāsasyānyat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:237_0: tad evam iyatā prabandhena prakramabhedaṃ vicārya kramaprāptaṃ kramabhedaṃ vicārayitum
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:237_1: āha kramebhedo yatheti / nanu yadi smṛtiparāmarśakasya tacchabdasyānubhūta evārtho viṣaya ity ucyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:238_0: ye 'tyantaparokṣā rāmādayas teṣāṃ kavinā kāvye tacchabdena kathaṃ parāmarśaḥ kriyate
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:238_1: teṣām atīndriyatvād ity āha atra ca pratītimātram iti / ayam atrābhiprāyaḥ / yena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:239: tasya tadapekṣā nyāyyā / smṛtiś ca pratītimātram antareṇānupapadyamānā tadapekṣiṇī syāt,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:240_0: naindriyikapratītyapekṣiṇī aindriyakapratītiṃ vināpi śabdādibhyaḥ pratītau tasyāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:240_1: saṃbhavadarśanāt / rāmādīnāṃ ca yadi naindriyikī pratītis tadā śabdāt prasiddher
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:240_2: vā pratītir astu / tannibandhanaś ca smṛtiparāmarśakena tacchabdena parāmarśa iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:240_3: na kaś cid virodhaḥ / nanv iti / ayam atrārthaḥ / padārthavimarśapurassaro vākyārthavimarśa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:240_4: iti na padārthavimarśavelāyāṃ bhavatv iyam āśaṅkā / vākyārthavimarśasamaye tv akhaṇḍapratītau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:240_5: pūrvāparabhāvaniyamāvabhāsanābhāvān nāsya doṣasyāvakāśaḥ / uddeśyatvāc ca vākyārthapratīter
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:240_6: antaraṅgatvam iti tadāśrayeṇaiva vyavasthopapattau na kramadoṣacintā kā cid iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:240_8: śabdavyavahāramukhena śrotṛgṛhīto vākyārthavimarśaḥ svīkṛtaḥ / vaktur iti yadi śortṛvimarśaparyavasāyī
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:241_0: tadā śabdair vaktṛvimarśasyāsaṃbandhitvād anumānaṃ na syād ity arthaḥ / tatra cāsāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:241_1: iti vaktṛśrotṛgate vākyārthavimarśe sūkṣmatvenāsphuṭarūpo 'sty eva paurvāparyapratibhāsa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:241_2: iti yāvat / padārthabuddhāv iti vākyārthapūrvabhāsinyām / tatrāpīti / vaktṛśrotṛgatavākyārthavimarśe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:241_3: 'pi sūkṣmaḥ padārthāśrayo doṣo durnivāraḥ padārthān atikrameṇaiva vākyārthavimarśasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:241_4: vyavasthitatvād ity arthaḥ / pramādaja iti / evaṃ sati prakraṃsyamānavastuparāmarśadoṣas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:241_5: tāvat parigṛhītā bhavati / pratīpagamanahetor iti gajasetubandhād ity asya / śābdasyeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:241_7: satīty arthaḥ / gaṅgāviśeṣaṇamukheneti gajasetubandhām iti pāṭhe / ayam atrāśayaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:241_8: - śābdo yatra hetuhetumadbhāvas tatra hetutvenāpanyāsān na tayor vyavadhānaṃ kiṃ cit kāryam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:242_0: pratītiviprakarṣaprasaṅgāt / ārthe hetuhetumadbhāve upanyastasya hetutvād viśeṣaṇabhūtasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:242_1: hetor viśeṣyasvarūpavarṇanena caritārthatvāt saty api vyavadhāne na pratītiviprakarṣaḥ kaś cit,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:243_0: paryālocanasāmarthyād dhetutvapratīteḥ / atra ca śloke tīrthe tadīye iti padadvayākaraṇe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:243_1: 'pi vākyārthasya nirākāṅkṣtvāt tatkaraṇam apuṣṭārtham eva / tadeti tacchabdena /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:243_2: iti tacchabdaḥ āropanivṛttāv iti āropo bhramo 'nyasyānyatvena pratītiḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:244_0: yathā navajaladharasya sannaddhadṛptiniśācaratvena / tannivṛttāv atra vakṣyamānāyām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:244_1: āropaviṣayasya jaladharāder vastusataḥ prakāśamānasyedamādinā nyāyye nirdeśe tasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:244_2: parāmṛśyasamīpa eva prayogeṇa bhāvyam / yas tv avastusadāropyamāṇanikaṭe prayogaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:244_3: sa kramabhedam āvahati / yas tv atraivāropaviṣayasvarūpatayā vidyuto nikaṭa idam ādyaprayogaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:246: utkhātadrutam iva śailaṃ himahatakamalākaram iva lakṣmīvimuktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:247: pītamadiram iva caṣakaṃ bahulapradoṣam iva mugdhacandrarahitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:248_0: itīveti / atropalambharūpaḥ pūrvavākyārtha itiśabdāvacchinna utprekṣyata ity upālabdhety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:248_1: ataḥ pūrvam itīvaśabdau prayojyau / viṣayāntare tu prayogāt kramabhedaḥ / prāpipayiṣupadeneti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:248_2: pūrvavākyārthasthitena / tadadhīnatvaṃ puruṣāyattatvam / stambaram iti pīnonnatastanadvayadarśanād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:248_3: ayaṃ praśaṃsoktiḥ / ṣidgāḥ viṭāḥ / pratītivaicitryam iti vākyārthasya tilatuṇḍalīkṛtasyāvagamānavagamau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:248_4: uktisvarūpeti / uktiḥ stamberamaḥ pariṇinaṃsur asāv upaiti ity eṣā / tasyā viṭasaṃbandhinyāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:248_5: svarūpam itiśabdenopalakṣaṇatvād evaṃśabdādinā vyavacchettum iṣṭam / ataś ca tatra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:248_6: tasmād itiśabdād itiśabdopalakṣitād evamādayaś ca prāk pūrvam ukteḥ pūrvapradarśitāyāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:248_7: anyat kiṃ cit padaṃ ṣidga ityādi na kathanīyam ity arthaḥ / evam udāharaṇāntare 'pi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:248_8: yojanīyam / upādhibhāvād iti itiśabdasya svā śaktiḥ pūrvavākyāvacchedarūpā / tāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:248_9: pūrvatra vākye samarpayaṃs tasyopādhir itiśabdaḥ saṃpadyate / ataś ca na tasyānyatra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:248_10: prayogaḥ karttavya ity arthaḥ / padasyānyasyeti ṣidgair ityādeḥ / anyatheti viṣayāntaraprayoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:251_0: iti nyāyenārthaucityavaśād vyavahitānām apy ānantaryaniyamo bhaviṣyatīty arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:251_2: iti teṣāṃ prayogo niyataḥ syād ity uktam / nanu yasya yenābhisaṃbandho nyāyyaḥ kutrāvatiṣṭhatām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:251_3: ity āha kaiś cid eveti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - ityādiśabdavarjanenoktakrameṇa śabdahetvādivarjanena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:251_4: cānyeṣāṃ śabdānām ayaṃ nyāyaḥ / ityādīnām ayaṃ punar niyataprayogaviṣaya iti / nānyathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:252_0: evam uddeśakrameṇa kramabhedaṃ vimṛśya paunaruktyaṃ vicārayitum āha paunaruktyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:252_1: iti / iha khalu dvividhaṃ paunaruktyaṃ śabdapaunaruktyam arthapaunaruktyaṃ ceti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:252_2: tad uktam akṣpādamuninā - śabdārthayoḥ punarvacana[ṃ] punaruktam anyatrānuvādād iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:253_0: arthapaunaruktyena duṣṭatva[ṃ] arthasyaiva prayojakatvāt / arthapaunaruktyam evaikaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:253_1: paunaruktyaṃ na śabdapaunaruktyam iti samudāyārthaḥ / ārtham iti arthāśritam / evaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:253_2: śābdam ity atrāpi vācyam / yad uktam iti vādanyāye / hasatīti eko hasatiśabdaḥ śatrantaḥ svāmiviśeṣaṇam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:254_0: aparaḥ kriyāpadam / evam uttaratra vācyam / yantram iti / abhedopacāreṇa bhṛtyasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:254_1: nirdeśaḥ kṛtānukāritvāt / anyatra tātparyabhedād iti tātparyabhede hi svarūpārthāviśeṣe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:256: śabdānāṃ vā padānāṃ vā lāṭānuprāsa iṣyate //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:257: iti / śakrasaṅkāśeti śrīnadīhaṃseti medinīcandreti vidviṣāṃ kāleti ca catvāryāmantraṇāṇi / atra tātparyabhedaḥ sphuṭa eva / tathā caikaḥ kāśaśabdo vastrāṇām upameyatvena sthitaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:258_0: anyas tu hasānām upamānatveneti bhinnaṃ tātparyam / evam anyad api yojanīyam / ubhayābhāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:258_1: iti arthabhedasya tātparyabhedasya cābhāva ity arthaḥ / na ca ghāseti karmatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:258_2: saṃbandhitvena cāstu tātparyabheda ity arthaḥ / etan na ceti niṣidhyate / svārtham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:258_3: iti / etad uktaṃ bhavati - na svārthābhidhānam eva tātparyam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:259: api tu saty eva svārthābhidhāne 'dhikam arthāntaronmukhatvaṃ tātparyaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:260_0: yathā kāśaśabdayoḥ / tatra kāśajātyavacchinnadravyapratipādanād atirikta upamānopameyabhāvaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:260_1: pratipādyate / na caivaṃbisaśabdayoḥ / na hy atra bisajātyavacchinnadravyātiriktaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:260_2: kiṃ cid vastu pratīyate / yat tu karmatvaṃ saṃbandhitvaṃ ca tadabhidheyasyaiva tathāvasthānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:260_3: nodrekeṇānyatām āvahatīti svaśabdaparihāreṇa sarvanāmaparāmarśasyaiva viṣayo nyāyya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:260_4: iti / nanu punaruktaṃ kim ucyate yatra tat prayogaṃ vinārthapratītiḥ yatra ca tatsamānapadāntaraprayogo 'vaśyam upayujyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:261: tatra kathaṃ punaruktatvam / yatraikārthena pratītir na tātparyabhedaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:262_0: tatra punaruktatvaṃ pratītivairasyāpādānāt / yatra tu tat samānaṃ padāntaram upayujyatāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:262_1: mā vā / sarvathā tatprayogakṛta vairasyaṃ paunaruktyaprayojakam iti tadāśrayeṇāyaṃ doṣa uktaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:263: sarvanāmeti jakṣur bisam ity atra nirdiṣṭaṃ bisam uttaratra prasūnasaṃbandhitvena sarvanāmaparāmarśārhaṃ sad yat svaśabdenoktaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:264_0: tat śabdapunaruktam / yady apy arthapunaruktam evaikaṃ punaruktaṃ prāg uktaṃ tathāpi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:264_1: śabdasya punaruktatety uktam arthamukhenaiva śabdasyāpi punaruktatety abhiprāyeṇa /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:264_2: sarvanāmaparāmarśayogyasyeti nirdiṣṭāṃ yogyatāṃ vibhaktum āha - prādhānyam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:264_3: dvividhaṃ parāmarśayogyatvaṃ śābdam ārthaṃ ceti / tatra yasmin parāmṛśyasya svātantryeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:264_4: kartṛtvādinā nirdeśena prādhānyaṃ tatra śābdam / yatra punaḥ parāmṛśyasyānyaḥ kaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:265_0: tatrārtham / tatra hi saṃbandhinaṃ prati asyopayoga eva yogyatvam / tathā caikam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:265_1: udāhṛtam / saṃbandhipratītimukheneti / atra saṃbandhī haraḥ tasya maulidvāreṇa śaśāṅkasaṃbandhitvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:266: na tu cārutā vapur ityādau cārutāder iva sākṣād eva śaśāṅkasya pratītiḥ / śaśāṅkasaṃbandhinām iti / atra saṃbandhinibandha iti kārikāyāṃ yaḥ saṃbandhī yuktaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:267_0: sa nirdiṣṭaḥ / tathā cātrāṃśavaḥ saṃbandhitvena nirdiṣṭāḥ / tatparāmarśayogyateti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:267_1: tacchabdena parāmṛśyaḥ śaśāṅko nirdiṣṭaḥ / sā hi guṇībhūtasyeti / haramanyapadārthaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:267_2: prati niśāpatir guṇībhūtaḥ / tasyāpi niśā guṇībhūtā / sā ca bhuvaneti / atra na nagendratanayāyāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:267_3: saṃbandhī nirdiṣṭaḥ / api tu sā cety anena svarūpam nirdiṣṭam / vihasto na kva cic
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:267_4: chaktaḥ / samāsagatasyeti parāmṛśyasyeti saṃbandhaḥ / tatra hi parāmṛśyasya samāse
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:267_5: guṇībhāvāt saṃbandhinaś cānirdeśāt parāmarśo na nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:268: na sarvajanasaṃvedanīya iti / asyārthaḥ - yathāsmai rocate viśvaṃ tathedaṃ parivartate iti nyāyenātrātiprauḍhatayā granthakāro nijāyattāṃ padārthavyavasthāṃ karttum ārabdhaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:269: yena tadaṃśunicitaḥ iti tat tamasām iti ca śaśāṅkasya niśāyāś ca tacchabdena parāmarśam aghaṭamānam api samarthayate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:270_0: jakṣur bisaṃ ghṛtavikāsibisaprasūnā ity atra ca bisaprasūnaśabdasya saṃjñāpadasyāpi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:270_1: bisaśabdāśrayeṇa sūkṣmekṣikayā paunaruktyaṃ doṣam udbhāvayati / na caitat samarthanaṃ hṛdayahāri,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:271_0: yasmāc chaśāṅkamaulir iti ca niśāpatimaulir iti ca saṃjñāśabdāv etau / saṃjñāśabdānāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:271_1: ca vidyamānasyāpy arthānugamasya na prayojakatvaṃ rūḍheḥ prādhānyāt / tataś cātra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:271_2: na śaśāṅkārtho na niśārthaḥ kaś cit / kiṃ tūpāyamātreṇaitāv arthāv āśritya saṃjñiviśeṣa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:271_3: evātra vivakṣitaḥ / evaṃ ca saṃjñyantargatayoḥ śaśāṅkaniśayos tacchabdaparāmarśena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:271_4: sahṛdayahṛdayāny āvarjayatīti haṭhasarmathanam etat / kiṃ ca śaśāṅkamaulir ity atra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:271_5: varaṃ śaśāṅkasya bhavatu sarvanāmnā parāmarśaḥ tasya vakrākṛtes tatra saṃnihitatvāt,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:272_0: niśāpatimaulir ity atra tu niśāyāḥ parāmarśaḥ pāpāt pāpīyān niśāpater evoktakrameṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:272_1: tatra saṃnihitatvāt / niśāyā upalakṣaṇamātratvenopayoginyās tatra saṃbhavābhāvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:272_2: yatra ca tasyā eva na saṃbhavas tatra kā vārtā tamasām / tad ayam andho maṇim avindat /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:272_3: tam anaṅgulir āvayad iti nyāya āyāt / api ca yatra prasāritānugamena śabdena saṃjñinaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:275: tatprabhābhir iva pūritaṃ vapur bhāti yasya sitabhasmaguṇṭhitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:276_0: iti / atra hi pādavyāpinī saṃjñānvarthatvam evotkarṣayati / tenātra parāmarśo nāpratītikaraḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:276_1: prakṛte tu tādṛśy api gatir nāsti / āstāṃ vā prakṛtam / atrāpi hi rohiṇīramaṇetyādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:276_2: yadi sūkṣmekṣikā kriyate tadā saṃjñāprādhānyāt tadaṃśasya sarvanāmaparāmarśo nāduṣṭatām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:276_3: bhajate / prakṛte tu pāpāt pāpīyān parāmarśaḥ / kṛtaṃ cātra samarthanaṃ granthakṛtā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:276_4: tad etad asya viśvam agaṇanīyaṃ manyamānasya svātmanaḥ sarvotkarṣaśālitākhyāpanam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:277_0: granthakarttuḥ punar ayam āśayaḥ - iha tu dvividhāḥ saṃjñāśabdāḥ rūḍhā yogarūḍhayaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:277_1: ca / tatra rūdḥānām arthānugamābhāvāt tadanusaraṇaṃ na karttavyam / ye tu yogarūḍhayas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:277_2: teṣāṃ yadi yoga utkaṭatāṃ bhajate tadāśrayo vyavahāro na duṣyati / ata eva nimittabalena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:277_3: pravṛttasya śabdasya nimittāntarbhāve prayogaḥ saugatair niṣiddha eva / yad āhuḥ -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:279: śabdānām anurundhāno na bādhas tena varṇitaḥ //

GK16ruvyavivya_pu:292: vanakariṇām iti ca ṣaṣṭhīsamāsenaiva taddhitakarmadhārayalakṣaṇavṛttidvayārthapratīteḥ / vārtraghneti vṛtraghna indrasyāpatyam atra vivakṣitaṃ,

GK16ruvyavivya_pu:294: tatra viśeṣyaprayogo na duṣyati yathā tatra prasādād ity atra vakṣyate / kiṃ tūpāyamatreṇaitāva bhavaśabdasyeti śītakiraṇābharaṇa ity anenaiva pratītatvād bhavārthasya,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:295_0: yathā nidhānagarbhām iva sāgarāmbarām ity atra sāgarāmbarāśabdena medinyāḥ / camūrur

GK16ruvyavivya_pu:295_4: udāharati / tadviśeṣaḥ viśeṣyagato viśeṣaḥ / haraśabdasyeti pinākapāṇiśabdena haragato
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:295_5: viśeṣaḥ pratipādyate yaḥ sarvotkarṣahetutvena vivakṣito na sajñimātram ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:295_6: viśeṣyopādānam antareṇāpīti / kusumāyudhaśabdo 'pi hi viśeṣaṇam api viśeṣyam avagamayaty
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:295_7: avyabhicārāt / na tu tasya pṛthakprayogaḥ / atrāpīti pinākapāṇer ity atra liṅuttamapuruṣeṇaiveti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:295_8: asmady uttamaḥ ity atra hi sthāniny apīty anuvartanād aprayukte 'py asmacchabde tadarthasaṃbhave
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:295_9: uttamapuruṣo bhavaty eva / tadanupādānaṃ viśeṣyānupādānam / anyeṣām iti / bahuvacanād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:295_10: īdṛkṣu sthāneṣv ekenaivevaśabdena gatārthatvād anyeṣāṃ prayogo viphala ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:295_11: tṛtīyasyāpīti vākyārthaupamyavivakṣāyām eka evevaśabdaḥ prayoktavyaḥ / padārthaupamyavivakṣaṇe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:295_12: tu yāvanto viśeṣyabhūtāḥ padārthās tāvanta ivaśabdāḥ prayoktavyāḥ / na tv ardhajaratīyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:295_13: kāryam ity arthaḥ / etac cābhyupagamavādenoktam / na tu saṃbhavantyāṃ vākyārthopamāyāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:295_14: padārthopamāḥ kāryā ity asya pakṣaḥ / tathā ca dine dine ityādinā dūṣayiṣyati / dine
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:295_15: dine iti / atra cāndramasyā lekhāyā pārvatyupamānaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:296_0: viśeṣāṇāṃ tu kalāntarāṇi / viśeṣāṇāṃ ca lāvaṇyamayān iti viśeṣaṇam / tatsthanīyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:296_1: kalāntarāṇāṃ jyotsnāntarāṇīti / jyotsnāntare yeṣām iti hi vyākhyā / dine dine ityādi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:296_2: pārvatīndulekhayoḥ sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ / na tu kalāntarāṇi kartṝṇi jyotsnāntarāṇi puṣṇatīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:296_3: sādhvī vyākhyā vacanabhedādidoṣaprasaṅgāt / atra cāndramasīva lekhā kalāntarāṇi puṣṇātīty
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:296_4: ekenaivevaśabdena gatārthatve dvitīyasyevaśabdasya paunaruktyam / yaṃ sametyeti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:296_5: atra yam ity asya caṇḍamāruta upamānaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:297_0: cedipadasya ca pradīpaḥ / tulyārthe vatiḥ / vilocanapraśamanād eva śambhuvibhramatyāgaḥ /

GK16ruvyavivya_pu:297_2: vikṛtapadaprayogo vairasyaṃ ca dupariharam eva / tena caṇḍamārutanavapradīpavad iti

GK16ruvyavivya_pu:297_4: doṣaparihārapratītiḥ saundaryaṃ ca / malayajārdram iveti himāṃśukhaṇḍasyotprekṣyatvenopanibaddham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:297_5: ākāṅkṣāsaṃnidhisāmarthyāl lalāṭataṭasya viśeṣaṇaṃ paryavasyatīti kaver abhiprāyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:297_6: vastutas tv ivaśabdaprayogam antareṇāpīṣṭasiddher ivaśabdaḥ punar uktaḥ / na candrakhaṇḍasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:297_7: malayajārdratvotprekṣaṇe prayojanaṃ kiṃ cit / yatra caitad dhi viśeṣaṇam upayujyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:298_0: tatrevaśabdaprayogo vyarthaḥ / tadabhinnārtheneti samāse ivārthagarbhīkārāt / viparyayeṇeti

GK16ruvyavivya_pu:298_2: kevalaṃ hārīty asya samāsākaraṇād ivārthāpratīter ivaśabdo na punar ukta iti paunaruktyaparihāraḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:298_3: kṛtaḥ / aho aparyanteti od iti pragṛhyasaṃjñā / upamārūpaketyādinā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:301_0: iti / vakroktijīvitakṛtas tu tam alaṅkārapuṣṭhapātinam alaṅkāraṃ dūṣayati / nirmokam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:301_1: uktim iveti atropamārūpakatvaṃ paraprasiddhyoktam / na tv idam upamārūpakam / utprekṣārūpakaṃ tu syāt,

GK16ruvyavivya_pu:303_3: nirmoka upamānatvena nirdeśyaḥ syāt / bhinnaliṅgayor upamāyā duṣṭatvān na nirdiṣṭa

GK16ruvyavivya_pu:303_7: kriyāmātrotprekṣaṇam upapadyata ity utprekṣārūpakam etat paramārthataḥ / etad asmābhir

GK16ruvyavivya_pu:307: nibaddhā sā kṣayaṃ naiti prakṛtir jagatām iva //

GK16ruvyavivya_pu:311_0: vivakṣāyā nānātvāt / tathā hi kva cit sādṛśyamātraṃ vivakṣitam / tatrāpi kva cid
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:311_1: abhedaḥ / tasminn api kvacid āropaḥ / kvacid adhyavasāyaḥ / adhyavasāye 'pi kva cit
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:311_2: sādhyatvaṃ kva cit siddhatvam ityādikrameṇānantaprakāraṃ vicchittivaicitryam / tatrāpi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:311_3: saṃyojanakrameṇa navaṃ vicchittivaicitryam anubhūyamānam āśritaṃ ca mahākavibhiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:311_4: kathaṃ saṃkṣeparucitvenāpahnūyate / na hīdaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣaṇaśāstraṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:312_0: yena mātrālāghavaṃ cintyate / tatrāpi vā na niyamena lāghavam āśritaṃ mahadbhiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:312_1: tathā hi vāgrahaṇasya sthāne 'nyatarasyāṃ grahaṇam api kṛtam / vicchittivaicitryaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:312_2: tair apy āśritam eva / tad uktaṃ vicitrā hi sūtrasya kṛtiḥ pāṇineḥ iti / evaṃ cātra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:312_3: kṛte 'pi rūpake utprekṣādinibandhaḥ kam api guṇam utkarṣayati na doṣam iti sahṛdayair
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:312_4: nipuṇaṃ nirūpaṇīyam / na tu hevākasya paścāl laganīyam ity āstāṃ tāvat / prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:313_0: murmuraḥ aṅgāraḥ / āmravaṇasyeti pranirantar ṇatvam / pathikavrajān parita iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:313_1: paritaśśabdayoge abhitaḥ paritaḥ samayānikaṣā iti dvitīyā / atra dadhur ivetīvaśabdaḥ punar ukta eva,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:315: tat pātu vaḥ śrīpatinābhipadmaṃ svādhyāyaśālā kamalāsanasya /

GK16ruvyavivya_pu:317_0: ityādāv anukāraśabdaprayoge ivādiśabdaprayogasya paunaruktyam avaseyam / prativastvalaṅkārād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:317_1: iti pūrṇaḥ śaśāṅkābhyudayam ākāṅkṣati mahārṇavaḥ iti prativastūpamayā sādṛśyapratītau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:317_2: dṛṣṭāntaśabdoktir duṣṭā / na ca dṛṣṭāntālaṅkāratvaṃ pratipādayituṃ dṛṣṭāntaśabdaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:318_0: dṛṣṭāntaśabdād dṛṣṭāntālaṅkāratvāpratīteḥ / na hi ṣaṣṭhyādiparihāreṇa saṃbandhiśabdāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:318_1: saṃbandhapratītiḥ rasaśabdād vā rasapratītiḥ / adūraviprakarṣeṇa tv abhidhānaṃ vastusaṃsparśi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:318_2: bhavatīti / nanu svakaṇṭhenābhidhānam apahāya kim iti sādṛśyapratītir āśrīyata ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:318_3: āha vācyo hy artha iti / pūrvavad iti / pūrvaṃ yathā ālānam ity ādau rūpakamukhenopamānopameyabhāvaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:318_4: kathitas tadvad iha dīpakamukhenety arthaḥ / atra ca dvayoḥ prabhādhenvoḥ prākaraṇikatvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:318_5: tulyayogitām adyatanā manyante / dvayor api prākaraṇikatve mahāprakaraṇāpekṣayā dhenoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:318_6: prakṛṣṭaṃ prākaraṇikatvaṃ prabhāyās tv aprakrṣṭam ity etadapekṣayā cirantanair dīpakam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:318_7: etat sthāpitam / tadapekṣayātrānena tadvācoyuktiḥ kṛtā / evam alaṅkārāntareṣv api
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:318_8: samāsoktyapastutapraśaṃsādiṣu / tatrāpy upamānopameyabhāvaḥ svakaṇṭhena nopanibandhanīyaḥ / tathā -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:319: draviṇam āpadi bhūṣaṇam utsave śaraṇam ātmabhaye niśi dīpikāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:320: bahuvidhārthyupakārabharakṣamo bhavati ko 'pi bhavān iva san maṇiḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:321_0: ity atrāprastutapraśaṃsayā bhavadarthasya sadṛśatvena pratīteḥ punar vacanaṃ na karttavyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:321_1: iti vakṣyate / asmābhiś caitat prapañco bṛhatyāṃ kariṣyate / itinaiveti itiśabdo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:321_3: vā garbhīkṛtya pravartate / varam iti uktadoṣadvayanivāraṇamātram etat / na tu sarvathā niravadyam idam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_0: yataśśabdātaśśabdayor vaiyarthyāt / anibandhanasyeti na hi pūraṇīyapūrakatvena duṣṭatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_1: aviśeṣaṇa iti viśeṣaṇadānārtham avyabhicāriṇo 'pi prayogaḥ śasyata ity arthaḥ tathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_2: cāha vāmanaḥ - viśeṣaṇasya ca iti / vyalokyateti vilokanakriyaiva lokitāraṃ lokam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_3: ākṣipatīti lokaśabdasya paunaruktyam / dvaya'rpāti prasthānavaśān nītivaśāc cāśrīyante /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_4: gām iti gośabdasya vākparyāyasya vacanakriyāyām avyabhicārāt prayogo na kāryaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_5: dṛṣṭa iti darśanakriyāyā dṛg eva karaṇatvenākṣipteti dṛkśabdaḥ punar uktaḥ / kārakāntareṣv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_6: apīti yathā sthāne tiṣṭhati ity atrādhikaraṇasya paunaruktyam / vivikte sthāne tiṣṭhatīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_7: tu viśeṣaṇārthaṃ prayogo na duṣṭaḥ / ekaiveti ekaivopamādiḥ / śābdatvaṃ śrautatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_8: yathevādiśabdaprayogāt / ārthatvaṃ sadṛśādiśabdaprayogāt / atisphuṭām iti sthūladṛṣṭyaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_9: dṛśyām ity arthaḥ / umāvṛṣāṅkāv iti / atra śarajanmanā yathetyādinā pratīto 'py upamānopameyabhāvas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_10: tatsadṛśenetyādinā punar uktaḥ / kaves tu nandananimittaḥ pūrva upamānopameyabhāvaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_11: pratīyamānaprabhāvādinimittas tv aparaḥ / tathā cāyaṃ dilīpa iti rājendur induḥ kṣīranidhāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_12: iva ity evaṃvidham upamānopameyabhāvam ātanoti / granthakāras tu viśiṣṭopamānanirdeśān
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_13: nāntarīyakatayā prabhāvādipratītir bhavatīti na dvirupādānaṃ kāryam iti manyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322_14: yasyeti yasya pūrvatāder yadrūpatāyāḥ priyatamādirūpatvasyābhivyaktiḥ sāmarthyāl
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:323: tasya parvatādeḥ tadarthaṃ priyatamādirūpatvapratītyartham upamā rūpakaṃ vā yan nibadhyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:324_0: tat punar uktam ity arthaḥ / uravo mahāntaḥ payodharā meghāḥ urū ca payodharau stanau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:324_1: ca / samayāt saṅgatety arthaḥ / ārdranakhakṣatam iveti bhinnakrama ivaśabdaḥ / yāpito
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:324_2: gamitaḥ nirvāhita ity arthaḥ / upamānād eveti ākārasādṛśyena palāśaṃ prati dīyamānād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:324_3: ārdranakhakṣatam ity asmāt / tadviśeṣaṇopādānam iti ramaṇadattam ity ārdranakhakṣataviśeṣaṇopādānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:324_4: madayāpitalajjayeti pramadāviśeṣaṇopādānaṃ cety arthaḥ / yata iti nakhakṣatam ivety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:324_5: upamopakṛtāt surabhivanamālādīnāṃ puṃstvastrītvanirdeśād ity arthaḥ / strīpuṃsatvānumitir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:324_6: iti prathamavimarśoktaprakāreṇa vyakter anumitirūpatvenopapāditatvāt / aindraṃ dhanur
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:324_7: iti atyanteti ābhogīti codāharaṇatrayaṃ vaidharmyakrameṇoktam / upapannakramasyāsya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:324_8: sadbhāvāt / nāyakatvapratināyakatve iti / anumīyate iti śeṣaḥ / evam aṅganeva maṇistambhāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:324_9: iti anumīyata iti śeṣaḥ / bhogī vāsukeḥ sa eva netram ākarṣaṇarajjus tasya ā samantād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:325_0: tena mandarasya mūrttiḥ nitambe madhyabhāge valanaṃ parivarttanaṃ tenākulā jātā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:325_1: tathā ābhogi vistāravat yan netraṃ nayanaṃ tasya parivartanaṃ kaṭākṣīkaraṇaṃ sa eva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:325_2: vibhramo vilāsaḥ / mūrttyā samāropitanāyikāvyavahārayā / utkalikās taraṅgā ruhiruhikāś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:325_3: ca hṛdayaṃ madhyadeśāś cittaṃ ca / ārohārtha iti āroḍhum iti pūrvaślokabhāgagataḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:325_4: hṛdayārthaś ceti / hṛdayam ambunidher ity atra sthitiḥ / tayor iti āroho jīvavyāpāraviśeṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:325_5: hṛdayaṃ jīvakāyaikadeśaviśeṣaḥ / alaṅkārāntaratvam iti sādṛśyāl lakṣaṇā vakroktir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:325_6: ityādiprakāreṇa / lākṣaṇikahṛdayādiśabdaprayoge svaśabdaṃ vināpy arthāntaraṃ pratīyata
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:325_7: ity āha yadartheti / yatropameye 'mbunidhiprabhṛtau / yadarthaikāśrayo nāyakādirūpopamānaviṣayo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_0: tayor nāyakāder upamānasyāmbunidhyādeś copameyasyopamānopameyabhāvaḥ śābdo neṣyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_1: gamyamānas tv iṣṭa evety arthaḥ / atraiva aparāgetyādinā śābdatve doṣodāharaṇam āha /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_2: mūlāny amātyādiprakṛtivargaḥ vṛkṣāvabandhanāni ca unmūlayituṃ sukara iti yojanā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_3: tad dhīti upamānopameyatvam / rūpakaṃ yatheti / tasyopamā rūpakaṃ vā ity anusaṃdhatte /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_4: anurāgo lauhityam api / apiśabdaḥ sukhādipadanikaṭe yojanīyaḥ / vasuśabdas tejodhanayoḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_5: atra niṣkāsanam utkaṭatvena gaṇikādharmo rūpakasya sādhakaḥ pramāṇam / kāryataś ceti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_6: kāryam atra niṣkāsanam / tadviśeṣasya strītvaviśeṣasya gaṇikārūpasyeti / ubhayārtheti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_7: dvyarthapadaprayogaḥ pāṇḍupayodhareṇa ityādau / liṅgaviśeṣaḥ śarad raveḥ ityādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_8: guṇavṛtti padam āroḍhuṃ hṛdayam ityādau / upamānaviśeṣo yathā ārdranakhakṣatābham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_9: ityādau / ākrośo gālidānam / paryāyoktīti yena rāhustrīstanayoḥ kārkaśyalakṣmīr vṛthā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_10: kṛtety anena bhaṅgyantareṇa rāhoḥ śiraśchedaḥ prakāśita iti tatsādhanam asādhāraṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_11: cakraṃ pratīyata evety arthaḥ / padādīti padādigatānām akṣarāṇām anuprāso gumphabhaṅgī
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_12: darśayan kavīnām atyantavallabha ity arthaḥ / kalabhāṣiṇīti / atra kamalekṣaṇe ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_13: arthānuguṇaḥ pāṭhaḥ / anyathānuprāsahevākitaiva syāt / śatrur eva śātrava iti prajñāditvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_14: svārthe 'ṇ / tadrūpaṇam eveti upamāpekṣayā rūpakasya gamyamānaupamyatvāt prayogārhatve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_15: 'pi sāmarthyāvagatarūpatvād yatrābhidhānaṃ punar uktaṃ tatropamāyāṃ paunaruktye kā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_16: śaṅkā iti / ivaśabdasyeti mūrcchita iva mūrcchayatīty arthapratīteḥ siddhatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_17: viṣādisaṃparkād dhi mohaṃ prāptaḥ parān api mohayatīti prasiddham / ayaṃ mandadyutir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_18: iti nidarśanāyāṃ mamevety arthāt pratītaṃ na punar upāttam / mumūrccheti prasasārety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_19: arthaḥ / bādhakasadbhāvābhāva iti / anena yatraikasyaiva viśeṣaṇasyopamānopameyasaṃbandhabādhakam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326_20: asti tatra pṛthakprayoge 'pi na doṣaḥ, yathā -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_0: ityādau prativastūpamāyām ity āha / atra hīvādiśabdābhāve sati vākyabhedaḥ / prākaraṇikatvopamānopameyabhāvapratītau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_1: sādharaṇadharmasya pṛthakprayogam antareṇa vākyārthasaṅgatir na bhavatīti pṛthak
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_2: prayogo na duṣṭaḥ / tadvacanam iti sahajapadena svābhāvikatvavacanam / tulyavibhaktīnām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_3: arthāt upamānopameyānām / eṣā nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī / etanmadhye ekasyety arthaḥ / paryāyair
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_4: iti / svābhāvikapadādiṣu kṛteṣu sahajapadādibhiḥ / samāsāntarapadāśrayaṇeneti umā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_5: ca mā ca umāme / tayoḥ dhavāv ityādi dvandvapūrvakatatpuruṣāśrayeṇety arthaḥ / chāyānihatapadayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_6: iti prathamaṃ chāyāśabdaḥ dvitīyaś nihataśabdaḥ kartavyaḥ syād iti dārṣṭāntikakrameṇaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_7: dṛṣṭāntāv uktau / astv iti chāyānihataśabdayoḥ prayogaḥ / ubhayor apīti / dvandvapūrvakasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_8: bahuvrīher bahuvrīhipūrvakasya vā dvandvasyety arthaḥ / etac ca dṛṣṭāntagatatvenoktam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_9: api dārṣṭāntikagatatvenāpi paryavasānaṃ neyam / dārṣṭāntike hītthaṃ yojanā / tatpuruṣapūrvasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_10: dvandvasya dvandvapūrvasya vā tatpuruṣasya lakṣaṇānugamaḥ saṃbhavatīti / tadarthatvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_11: ity uktaṃ vidheyāvimarśavicāre / yāvadbhir iti padair ity arthāt / tatpuruṣalakṣaṇāśrayeṇeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_12: prakṛte dvandvalakṣaṇapūrvakatvaṃ jñeyam / evaṃ na dvandvalakṣaṇam ity atra tatpuruṣalakṣaṇapūrvakatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_13: boddhavyam / tasyeti dvandvasya / atajjātīya iti yatra tatpuruṣaśaṅkā nāstīti pārvatīparameśvarāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_14: ity atrāpi parameśvarapade karmadhārayāśrayaṇadarśanena tatpuruṣapūrvakatvaṃ yojanīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_15: avāntaracintayeti paunaruktyaprastāve samāsacintayety arthaḥ / atra mādhavaśabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_16: yaugikatve 'pi samṃjñātvena nrūḍher umāmādhavāv iti prayoge umāyā mādhavasya ca spṛṣṭatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_17: pratītir na tu dvandvapūrvakatatpuruṣārthasyeti dvandvalakṣaṇaṃ nātīva hṛdayaṅgamam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_18: ity āhuḥ / rekhā hīti rekhā maryādā avadhiḥ sīmeti paryāyāḥ / tatra heyapakṣapratikṣepeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_19: prayogo yathā saṃsāreti / atra saṃsārasaṃbhavasya nirākaraṇam iti heyasya pratikṣepaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_20: upādeyaparigraho yathā tvaṣṭur iti / atra saṃpadaḥ prasaro vistāra ity upādeyasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_21: parigrahaḥ / indūdayasyeva saṃnibhā yasyeti atra saṃnibhāśabdaḥ prabhāparyāyo vyākhyātaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:329_22: yathā tu dāṇḍo granthas tathā saṃnibhaśabdaḥ sadṛśaparyāyo 'sti tad uktam -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_0: iti / tadanusāreṇendūdayena sadṛśa indūdayasaṃnibha iti vyākhyeyam / taduktyaiveti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_1: avahitatvoktyety arthaḥ / mūḍhacetana iti mūḍhadhiya iti ca mohanāmno mūḍhatvasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_2: buddhidharmatvāt cetanadhīśabdayoḥ paunaruktyam / tatsaṃbandhāt tadavagatir iti cetanasaṃbandhāc
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_3: caitanyāvagatir ity arthaḥ / kṛpāmṛdur iti / kṛpā cetanadharma iti caitanyavācipadaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_4: na kṛtam / evaṃ mūḍhāḥ mūḍhaḥ ity atrāpi vācyam / uditavapuṣīti paunaruktyam evānusaṃdhatte /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_5: manaḥkartṛkatvaṃ pramodaḥ kriyākaraṇaśabdayor iti atra gauḥ śābaleya itivac chokakriyāśabdayoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_6: sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena prayogaḥ / granthakṛtas tu viśeṣasyaivopayogāt sāmānyāvyabhicārāc
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_7: ca kriyāśabdasya vaiyarthyam karaṇaśabdasya kriyāvācitvān niṣphalatvam iti śokaśabda
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_8: eva karttavya ity abhiprāyaḥ / anubhavaviśeṣātmatvopagama iti saugataprakriyayaitad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_9: uktam / vaiśeṣikās tu jaḍam evātmaguṇam ekārthasamavāyinā jñānena grāhyaṃ sukham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_10: āhuḥ / tatprakriyāyāṃ kartavyam evānubhavagrahaṇam / ekasyeti sāgarasya / itarasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_11: ceti uttārārthasya / tadrūpatāvagater ity ubhayatra vācyam / madirādraveti / atra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_12: samābhātīty ekaṃ padaṃ gaṇitam upasargāṇāṃ dyotyapāratantryeṇa pṛthakpadārhatvābhāvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_13: ekādiprayoge satīti ekasya prayogābhyupagame 'nyeṣām eva tattvam / tatrāpy ekatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331_14: aniyatam / evaṃ dvayos trayāṇām ityādiyojanā kāryā,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:332: tatrāpy aniyatatvena prakārabahutvāt / avivekaprayuktam iti / yady apy avimṛśyakāritvasyaivāpatkaraṇatvaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:333_1: eva kāraṇam uktaṃ bhavati / na hīti yasmin sati vahnau dhūma ityādike pratibandhakālabhāviny
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:333_2: anvaye sati viśeṣaṇasya yasya asati vahnau na dhūma ityādivyatirekasya gatiḥ pratītiḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:334_0: tasyānvayasya sa eva vyatireko hetur yuktaḥ vayavasthitasya hetuhetumadbhāvasya vaiparītyaprasaṅgāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:334_1: anvayapratītihetuko hi vyatirekapratītyupakramo na tu viparyayaḥ / viśeṣaṇāc ceti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:334_2: guṇalubdhā iti sādhāraṇatvād ity arthaḥ / sāmarthyeti / dvividhaṃ paunaruktyam arthagataṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:334_3: śabdagataṃ ceti / tatrārthasya sāmarthyasiddhatve 'rthagataṃ gauṇam āmukhe paunaruktyānavabhāsāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:334_5: pratyayārthaḥ prakṛtipratyayasamudāyārtha iti vyastasamastatvena yojyam / evaṃ prakṛteḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:334_6: pratyayasya cety atrāpi vācyam / anyathā prāṅnirdiṣṭasya pañcavidhasya paunaruktyasyāsaṅgrahaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:334_7: syāt / vihitasyeti / vastuvṛttyā sthitasya bahuvrīher yā karmadhārayaśaṅkā tayā matvarthīyādiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:334_8: śabdaḥ kṛto bisakisalayacchedapātheyavanta ityādau / tasya sphuṭaṃ paunaruktyaṃ vṛttidvayasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:334_9: gauravāt / yasminn iti jāmbavapallavādaunītyādau yasmin pallavaśabda ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:334_10: arthaḥ yatra + tyalakṣaṇo yattaddhitotpattiḥ yasmād aṇpratyayākhyāt taddhitād utpattiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:335_0: jambūpallavānīti samāsena gatatvāt taddhitavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt / viśeṣaṇavaśād iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:335_2: yatrecchet na tatra paunaruktyam / anyathā tu paunaruktyam / yathā pāyāt sa śītakiraṇābharaṇo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:335_3: bhavo vaḥ ityādau / sakṛd eveti sāmyābhidhāyī ivaśabdādiḥ / niryāya vidyetyādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:335_4: yadvad iti dṛṣṭāntamukhena janair ajātaskhalanair ityādi saṅgṛhītam / arthasyeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:335_5: rāhustrīratanayor ityādau / yadvaśād iti tajjigīrṣur ivetyādau / athavā yatra kārakaviśeṣavaśāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:336_0: tatra kriyākārakayoḥ prayogo na kārya ity ayam arthaḥ / yathā mā bhavantam ityādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:336_1: yo yaddharmeti aparadiggaṇiketyādau yo diglakṣaṇo 'rtho yaddharmasya gaṇikādharmasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:336_2: niṣkāsanāder upacāreṇopalakṣitaḥ / tathā ambunidher mamanthe ityādau yasya kāmukasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:336_3: saṃbandhaṃ yad hṛdayādi tetyanānvito 'mbudhilakṣaṇo yaś cārthaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:337_0: tasya tadrūpaṇād gaṇikākāmukarūpaṇāt na śābdī / neṣyate / ārthī punar iṣyata eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:337_1: prayuktāntargatair eveti madirādravetyādau / kartari iti pradhānabhūte rājādau kartari /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:337_2: tatkriyāyāṃ ca khaḍgena cchadakriyāyāṃ rūḍhāyāṃ sādhakatamasya khaḍgasya yāni bahūni
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:337_3: tadapekṣayāṅgāni dhārāvinipātādīni teṣāṃ vāg vacanaṃ neṣyate yathā karakalitetyādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:337_4: etad uktaṃ bhavati / rājādau karttari cchedādikriyāyāṃ yat sādhakatamaṃ khaḍgādyaṅgaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:337_5: tasyāpy aṅgānāṃ dhārāvinipātādīnāṃ vacanaṃ neṣyate tenaivāṅgena pradhānabhūtenāvāntarāṅgānām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:337_6: apy ākṣepād / doṣadvayaṃ prayukteti karttari iti ca pratipāditam / te iti samāsāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:337_7: vṛttāv iti / samāse vākye vā asādhāraṇaṃ yatra viśeṣaṇaṃ tatra viśeṣyaṃ na vācyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:337_8: yathā duḥkhānubhavetyādau / yo yadātmeti bāṣpāder jalādirūpatvāvyabhicārāt prayojanābhāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:337_9: jalādipadaprayogā na kārya ity arthaḥ / yathā nayane bāṣpavāriṇetyādau / yo yasyeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:337_10: yo niṣyandanādiḥ yasya candrakāntāder dharmiṇo 'vyabhicārī dharmaḥ tayoḥ samāso na praśasyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:338_0: yathā dviṣadvadhūlocanetyādau / anyathā iti / sādharmyārtha ity arthaḥ / kriyeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:338_1: kriyāyāḥ śokādilakṣaṇāyāḥ pratītiḥ karaṇapratītiṃ na vyabhicarati karaṇam eva yataḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:338_2: kriyā / tadapratītau karaṇāpratītau saiva śokādilakṣaṇā kriyā na niścitā syād ekatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:338_3: tyāgakriyety atraitad eva kriyāśabdapravṛttinimittam / tat tasmāt / tayadvaśāt śokādiśabdaprayogavaśād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:338_4: yasya karaṇasya vyaktiḥ prakāśas taduktau śākādiśabdaprayoge tat karaṇādivat padaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:339_0: yathā śokakriyākaraṇasyetyādau / prayukte ceti prakṛtyādipaunaruktyānāṃ caturṇām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:339_1: upasaṃhāraḥ / anyonyeti vākyapaunaruktyasaṃgrahaḥ / ubhayor uktir ekasya ubhayamadhyāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:339_2: kasya cit / paunaruktyaṃ nātikrāmati / yathā sahasā vidadhītetyādau //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:340_0: evaṃ paunaruktyaṃ saprapañcaṃ vicārya vācyāvacanaṃ prapañcayitum āha - vācyasyāvacanaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:340_1: yatheti / asamāsena nirdeśo vakṣyamāṇam etatsamānanyāyam avācyasya vacanam api kaṭākṣayitum /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:340_2: idamā parāmarśa iti abādhitapratyakṣanimittatvād bhrāntinivṛtteḥ pratyakṣasya ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:340_3: viṣayamukhena parāmarśārhatvāt / tasya yat svaśabdena vacanam iti pūrvaṃ saty eva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:343_0: iti punaruktam uktam / idānīṃ tu sarvanāmasthanīyatvena svaśabdena vacanaṃ vācyāvacanam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:343_1: ucyate / dharmidharmeti dharmī haralakṣaṇo 'rthaḥ / dharmaḥ kapālasaṃbandhena garhitatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:343_2: ubhayaṃ dharmidharmātmakam / viśeṣapratipattaya iti garhitatvam atra viśeṣaḥ / tasyeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:343_3: garhitatvasya / evaṃ tasya vivakṣitety atra jñeyam / vivakṣito 'rthaḥ śocyatālakṣaṇaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:343_4: ārtha iti viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa bhāvāt / vāmalocanātvam iti / na cātra vāmalocaneti viśeṣyapadam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:343_6: pratītiḥ / viśeṣaṇam evātra vāmalocanāpadam / tṛtīya iti ubhayavṛttitvākhyaḥ / na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:343_7: cāsāv iti āvṛttiḥ / na caiṣām iti tenaiva tatparyāyeṇa sarvanāmnā cety eṣāṃ prakārāṇām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:343_8: alpadoṣatvād iti / tasyeti vyavahitasaṃbandhāt kiṃ cid utkṛṣṭatvam / tasya samāgamaprārthanayeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:343_9: vācyam / arthabhedād iti / ayam arthaḥ ekasyāsakṛdvṛttā sarvā vāvṛttiḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:344_0: yathā daridrāṇāṃ bhojane kāṃsyapātryāḥ / tad uktam - āvṛttir asakṛdvṛttiḥ iti / na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:344_1: cārthabhede śabdasyaikatvaṃ nyāyyam arthabhedasya pradhānabhūtasya guṇabhūtaṃ śabdaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:344_2: prati bhedakatvam tvāt / tasmād atra dvayoḥ śabdayor vastuvṛttena yat sādṛśyaṃ yaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:345: tannibandhano 'yaṃ mukhya evāvṛttivyavahāra iti / ataś ceti / yata āvṛttir na yujyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:346_0: tata ity arthaḥ / dharmidharmobhayātmakam iti / ubhayamaye vastuni pratipatsita ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:346_2: vitataṃ vicārayati / alakālīti / alakāny evāḷikulam alakasadṛśaṃ cālikulam / chado
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:346_3: 'dharaḥ patrāṇi ca / āmodaḥ praharṣaḥ saurabhaṃ ca / karṇikā karṇābharaṇaṃ bījakośaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:346_4: ca / na śleṣasyeti / nanu śleṣaprastāve kaḥ prasaṅgo 'bjasyopamānacarcāyām / naitat /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:346_6: śleṣa evātra nyāyyo nopamety abhiprāyaḥ / ata eva śleṣe tu tasya vācyatayety uktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:346_7: nibandha iti nibadhnantīti nirdiṣṭaḥ / tatsāmyaṃ rajjvādisāmyam / na śleṣasyeti upamāśleṣasyety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:346_8: arthaḥ / tena rajjvādipratipādakaṃ guṇā iveti na vācyam / nanu viśeṣaṇasāmyanibandhanā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:346_9: samāsoktir na ca nibadhnantīti viśeṣaṇam ity āha na hi viśeṣaṇasāmyam eveti / etac
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:346_10: cāsmābhir harṣacaritavārtike nirṇītam iti tata evāvadhāryam / pṛthak tam upādāyeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:346_11: tacchabdena śaśī parāmṛṣṭaḥ / sa hy ārtha eveti upamānopameyabhāvaḥ / śleṣaviṣaye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:346_12: iti / atra tisraḥ kakṣyāḥ / rājaśabdasyobhayārthatvāc śleṣaḥ / tadanāśrayaṇenendunā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:346_13: rūpaṇaṃ tatpṛṣṭhe cendur ivety upamā / nanu rājendur ity atra tūpamārūpakayor ekaparigrahe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:347_0: na niyamena rūpakam / tat katham uktaṃ rūpakam āsūtritam iti / ucyate / prakramyamāṇopamābhiprāyāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:347_1: paunaruktyabhayena rūpakam āśritam / upamāyā abhāve tu saṅkara evātra yuktaḥ / yad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:347_2: vopamāpekṣayā rūpakasyātra samāse sphuṭatvena pratīte rūpakaṃ saṃśritam / anenaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:347_3: hy abhiprāyeṇa vakṣyati rūpakasya viṣaye upamāyā yatheti / tābhyāṃ spardhitum iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:347_4: rūpakaṃ śleṣarūpakābhyām / tayor yathāpūrvam iti / upamāpekṣayā rūpakasya rūpakāpekṣayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:348: nanv evaṃ satīti / asya doṣasyātiprasaṅgaṃ brūte / tāpa ātapo 'pi / phalaṃ śālyādikam api / sumanasaḥ puṣpāṇy api / khalatā durjanatvaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:349_0: dhānyādikṣodanasthānaṃ ca / asatī dūṣaṇīyā aśobhanā ca / yadalaṅkāreti / khalatām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:349_1: ityādāv upamotthāpite śleṣe nopamā śleṣaṃ bādhate / tasya viviktaviṣaytvābhāvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:349_2: śleṣas tu tām bādhate iti yuktam / asya nyāyasyālaṅkārāntare 'pi bhāvād vyāptigarbham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:349_3: uktaṃ yad alaṅkāreti / nibandhanāntarābhāve iti / sati samāsoktyādinibandhane pūrvavat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:349_4: śleṣottāpitopamā na kartavyā syāt / na cātrānirākṛtetyādiviśeṣaṇasāmyāt samāsoktir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:349_5: iti vācyam / viśeṣaṇānāṃ niyatopamānagāmitvāpratīteḥ / atra viṣayatāśaṅkaiveti upamāviṣayatvasaṃbhāvanety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:349_6: arthaḥ / kva cit tu tada[tadv]iṣayateti pāṭhaḥ / tatra śleṣaviṣayatvam upamāviṣayatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:349_7: ca yugapan na śaṅkanīyaṃ tayor utsargāpavādedabhāve na vyavasthiter ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:349_8: uktadoṣadvayeti / uktaṃ yac śleṣaviṣaye doṣadvayaṃ - yatra samāsoktiviṣaye śleṣaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:350_0: tasyātra saṃbandhābhāvād ity arthaḥ / yadalaṅkāreti / śleṣopamādīnām alaṅkārāṇām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:350_1: abhivyaktyarthaṃ ye śabdā abjam ivetyādayaḥ tebhyo 'laṅkārebhya itaraḥ samāsoktiśleṣādiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:350_2: tair eva śabdaiḥ alpatarair abjam ivetyādirahitair yadi vyajyeta tadāsau samāsoktiśleṣādir laghutvād grāhyo,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:351_0: nāparaḥ śleṣopamādir ity arthaḥ / nanu śobhātiśayahetutvam alaṅkārāntarāṇāṃ lakṣaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:351_1: tad viśeṣyate / tat katham idam uktam ity āha - na hy astīti / śobhātiśayajanane
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:351_2: nije vyāpāre nāsty alaṅkārāṇāṃ viśeṣaḥ / tataś caiko gṛhyate 'paras tyajyata iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:351_3: na yuktam / gurulaghutvam āśritya punar yujyata etan nānyatheti tātparyam / vācyātiśayāpekṣayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:351_4: caitad uktam pratīyamānatvāpekṣayā tu samanantaraṃ viśeṣo vakṣyate / kiṃ cetyādinā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:351_5: kāvyakriyāyāṃ saundaryaniṣpatteḥ prayojakatvam alaṅkāraniṣpatteś ca anuniṣpāditaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:351_6: yathā vaktā vedanācāmayoḥ ity āha / samāsoktiśleṣabhaṅgibhyām eveti / samāsoktyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:351_7: tu alakālītyādau / śleṣeṇa bhairavācārya ityādau / nopameyeti / alakālītyādāv upamā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:351_8: śleṣopamā / bhairavācārya ityādau upamaivopamā / atra samāsoktiśleṣabhaṅgibhyām eva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:351_9: ity etadgranthānusāreṇa rūpakasya viṣaye upamāyā yathetyādigranthaḥ prakṣipta iva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:352_0: uktadoṣadvayayogāsiddheḥ ity asya ca pūrvoktagranthasyātra pakṣe nyūnatvād ataś caivāyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:352_1: kva cid ādarśe na paṭhyate / aprakṣepe tu trirūpakagrahaṇam iha kartvyaṃ syāt / tasmāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:352_2: sa vā grantho nivārya iha vā rūpakagrahaṇaṃ prakṣepyam / uktadoṣadvayeti ca prakṛtaucityena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:352_3: vyākhyātam / te hi tatsiddhīti / rasabandhasiddhāv alaṅkārā avaśyaṃ sidhyantīty arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:352_4: niṣpādakatvam ihānmāpakatvam / ata eva bharate rasaniṣpattir ity atra rasānumitir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:352_5: iti vyākhyeyam / tadvaicitryaṃ vibhāvādivaicitryam / tadāśrayāḥ paraṃparayā rasāśrayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:352_6: rasajñaptihetava ity arthaḥ / tenaiṣām iti / kaver arthagataṃ cārutvaṃ tātparyeṇa saṃpādyaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:353_0: nālaṅkāropanibandhaḥ alaṅkārāṇāṃ tannāntarīyakatvenāprādhānyāt / ataś cārutvaṃ yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:353_1: niṣpadyate tathā teṣām upanibandhaḥ kāryaḥ / tatprayojanāc cādhānoddharaṇādaya ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:353_2: arthaḥ / nānvahādhānoddharaṇādaya ity uktyā alaṅkārāṇāṃ parasparaṃ cārutvaniṣpādane
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:353_3: viśeṣaḥ pratipāditaḥ / pūrvaṃ ca na hy asti nije ityādinā viśeṣābhāva uktaḥ / tat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:353_4: kathaṃ na virodhaḥ / naitat / pūrvam avavadhānena cārutvaniṣpādanaṃ manasikṛtya viśeṣābhāvaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:353_5: pratipāditaḥ / iha tu vibhāvādyupakaraṇatvena gurulaghutvādinā viśeṣa ukta ity apekṣābhedā[n
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:354_0: kaiś cid iti vāmanaprabhṛtibhiḥ / adhunā yat pratijñāmātreṇa pratipāditaṃ yathā śabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:354_1: śaktyantarābhāvād vyañjakatvaṃ na saṃbhavati iti tadvācyāvacanodāharaṇatvopayogi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:354_2: śleṣaprasaṅgenopapādayitum āsūtrayati - sa cāyam iti / yas samāsoktiviṣaye kṛto yasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:354_3: ca viṣaye upamā kṛtā sa ity arthaḥ / dvividha iti vakṣyamāṇasyobhayaśleṣasyātraivāntarbhāvaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:354_4: ābhyām eva samuccitābhyāṃ tasyotthāpanāt / yatrānyūneti yatra viśeṣyasya viśeṣaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:355_1: kartṛkarmeti / kartṛkarmarūpaḥ ādigrahaṇāt kriyārūpo yatra pradhānabhūto 'rthaḥ śleṣeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:356_0: na tatra śleṣo niravadya ity arthaḥ / tasya ca dharmapratipādakaśabdaviṣayatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:356_2: tu dūṣayiṣyate / aparas tv iti / arthaśleṣaḥ / ubhayatrāpi śabdaśleṣe 'rthaśleṣe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:356_3: ca / yāvad ivādi nibandhanaṃ nāśritaṃ tāvad arthāntaram apramāṇakam eveti śleṣābhivyaktyarthaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:356_4: nibandhanam āśrayaṇīyam / atrāntare iti phullamallikābhir dhavalā ye 'ṭṭās tripuracatuṣpuramahāprakārā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:356_5: āpaṇā vā tair vikāso hāso yasya tadvac ca dhavalāṭṭahāso yasya / kusumasamayayugaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:356_6: māsadvayaṃ ramyatvena tatsadṛśa ca yugaṃ kṛtādim upasaṃharan ajṛmbhata vikasitavān
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:356_7: vyaktānanaś cābhūd mahākālo dīrghasamayaḥ saṃhartṛdevatāviśeṣaś ca / samāsoktīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:356_8: mahākāla ity atra mahāsamaya ity aśliṣṭe viśeṣyapade prayukte viśeṣaṇasāmyād eva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:356_9: devatāviśeṣapratīteḥ samāsoktir bhavantī mahākālaśabdasyāvṛttau pramāṇam / na cātra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:356_10: mahākālaśabde prayukte prayāsaḥ kaś cit / yena alakālikuletivat samāsoktyā śleṣasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:356_11: vaiyarthyaṃ śaṅkyeta / ācchāditeti / parvatapakṣe ācchāditaṃ vaipulyād diśaś cāmbaram ākāśaṃ ca yena,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:357: uccakair ucyatāṃ gāṃ bhūmiṃ cākramya vartamānaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:360: evaṃvidhaṃ nageśaṃ parvatarājaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko na vismito bhavatīty arthaḥ / harapakṣe tu ācchāditaṃ paridhānīkṛta diśa eva asya nava vastraṃ yena,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:361: tathā u[k]taṃ sthūlaviṣāṇa ca vṛṣabham adhiruhya sthitaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:362_0: mastake candrakalānvitaṃ ca nageśa kailāsādhipatiṃ sākṣātkṛtya anugṛhītammanyatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:362_1: ko na vismayata ity arthaḥ / śveto dhāvatītivad iti śabdatantram / pradīpavad iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:362_2: punar arthatantram / yathāyogam iti tulyapradhānatvena sādhāraṇyaṃ tantram / atulyapradhānatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:362_3: tu prasaṅgaḥ / tayoḥ pratipattir iti / kiṃ cit khalu vastuśaktyaiva kāryakāri yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:362_4: dīpādi / kiṃ cit tu parāmarśāpekṣaṃ yathā dhūmādi liṅgam / yatra yasmin viṣaye parāmarśanairapekṣyeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:362_5: vastuśaktyaivobhayakāritvaṃ tatra tantrādi nānyatra / śabdaḥ parāmarśāpekṣo 'rthapratītikārī /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:362_6: parāmarśo na nirnibandhana iti nātra tantrādipravṛttiḥ / ahāryaḥ parvataḥ / sahakāritā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:362_7: saha karaṇaśīlatva sahakārasaṃbandhaś ca / anavamā utkṛṣṭāḥ / navaḥ pratyagraḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:362_8: mādhavo vasantaḥ / ramyatātireketi sahakārasaṃbandharūpa ity arthaḥ / tasya vācyasyeti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:363_0: samayasmṛtiḥ saṅketasmaraṇam / asiddham ekatvam iti / tataś ca nāyaṃ tantrāder viṣayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:363_1: tattvam ekatvam / avyayānavyayātmakam iti / avyayam ivādi / anavyayaṃ sadṛśādi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:363_2: dharmārthasyeti / śleṣād abhinnatvam iti yojyam / prakaṭeti / kulayaś caṭakāḥ tad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:363_3: uktam - kuliḥ kuliṅgaś caṭakaḥ iti / te ca te śakuntāḥ śakunayaḥ teṣāṃ cakreṇa samūhena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:363_4: bhāsvatīnāṃ valabhīnāṃ hitāḥ anurūpā mattavāraṇāḥ aṅkaḥ cihnaṃ yasyāḥ / niśānto 'ntaḥpuram /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:363_5: viḍambayantī uapahasantī / samarabhūpakṣe kuliśaṃ vajraṃ / kuntāḥ prāsāḥ / cakrāṇi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:363_6: arīṇi / tair bhāsvadbhiḥ / vyatireko viḍambayantīti prakāśitaḥ / prakaṭetyādau ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:363_7: viśeṣaṇabhāge 'tra śleṣaḥ / uṣasīti / andhakāra eva malinatvāt paṅkaḥ / tasya vigalitasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:363_8: plavo 'navasthānaṃ tena śabalaṃ vicitram / ghanavartma viyat / dūram atyartham /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:363_9: madhuraḥ sukumāro yas taraṇitāpo raviprabhā tadyogena tāraṃ hṛdyam / madhupāyino
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:363_10: bhramarās teṣāṃ paṅktiḥ / andhakārapaṅkaplava eva vigalanena nissāratvāc chavaḥ tasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:363_11: laṅghanena vartmasu pakṣmasu dūramā aramaṇīyaśrīḥ / madhuratā makarandāsaktā tathā raṇitā saśabdā,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_0: yad vā madhuratena makarandāsaṅgena raṇitaṃ guñjitaṃ yasyāḥ / payogatā jalagatā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_1: aram atyartham / atra ghanavartmaśabdasyopameyavācinaḥ śleṣe 'ntarbhāvāt dharmidharmobhayārthasyodāharaṇatve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_2: nyāyye dharmārthasyodāharaṇatvaṃ cintyam / anavarateti / anavarataṃ nayanasalilena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_3: sicyamāno vṛddhiṃ nīyamānaḥ / tathā anavarataṃ nayanaṃ prāpaṇaṃ yasya tena salilena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_4: sicyamāna ārdratvaṃ prāpyamāṇaḥ / vipado lavaḥ sūkṣmabhāgo vipallavo vigatakisalayaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_5: ca / prarohati vistīrṇībhavati aṅkurāṃś ca muñcati dharmāṃś ca muñcati dharmārthatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_6: iti / kila atra sthitam api dharmārthatvaṃ nopamānaviśeṣaṇatvāyālaṃ viśeṣaṇatvasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_7: kakṣyāntarabhāvitvāt / na cāvṛttim antareṇa kakṣyāntaraparigraho nyāyyaḥ / na cātrāvṛttiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_8: kāryā / pramāṇābhāvāt / anāvṛttau tu tasyām eva kakṣyāyāṃ viśeṣaṇatve upameyasvarūpāpahāraprasaṅga
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_9: iti padārthaḥ / tasyopameyeti tacchabdena vipallavaśabdaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ / yaḥ punar
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_10: iti śleṣaprayojakaḥ śabdaḥ / apradhānaṃ viśeṣaṇabhūtam / pradhānasya hi pūrvoktanyāyenāvṛttir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_11: nyāyyā / nibandhanam ivādi / sānuparvatasya mālabhūbhāgaḥ / aṅkollākhyās taravaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_12: teṣāṃ pallavā bhāsvanto yatra / aṅkollaśabdaḥ prākṛtabhāṣāpadam api kavibhir atiprasiddhyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_13: śleṣādiṣu prayujyate / tathā ca sakuśāṅkollapallavā / maithilīva śriyaṃ dhatte iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_14: parimalena prayutam / saṃskṛte punar aṅkoṭhaśabdaḥ sthitaḥ / tathā bhāsvān aṅke ullapan
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_15: mukharaḥ lavākhyaḥ putro yatreti sāmānyenānyapadārtho gṛhyate / iheti vipallavaśabde /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_16: ivādyavyayam iti / tarur iveti prayuktasyevaśabdasyānyathā vyavasthāpayiṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364_17: alaṅkārāntaraṃ samāsoktyādi / pradhānārthasaṃsparśamātrād iti / yataḥ tena padena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:365: tato 'ntarasaṃbandhāsahiṣṇutvāt dvirupādānārhatvam / yatra ca pradhānāpradhānobhayārthasya dvirupādānam avaśyaṃ kāryam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366_0: tatra daṇḍāpūpikayā tadekārthasya pradhānamātrārthasya śabdasya dvirupādānaṃ nyāyasiddham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366_1: eva / rucir dīptiḥ abhilāṣaś ca ruciḥ / atra dvau ruciśabdau viśeṣyavācitvāt pradhānārthau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366_2: nanūpamānasya yadi viśeṣyatvaṃ nopameyaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ tat katham upameyasaṃbandhiny
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366_3: upamānasya vibhaktiḥ yathā vāgarthāv iva saṃpṛktau iti / naiṣa doṣaḥ / viśeṣaṇatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366_4: avacchedakatvaṃ tac copamānasyopameyaṃ praty upamitikriyāyāṃ vidyata eva / anyathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366_5: tayoḥ saṃbandhābhāvād ananvyaprasaṅgaḥ / sthite viśeṣaṇatve tasya na viśeṣyavibhakter
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366_6: hāniḥ kā cit / yat punar ihopamānaśabdasya viśeṣyavācitvam uktaṃ tad dharmitābhiprāyeṇa /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366_7: dharmī hy upamānam / na ca svatantratvāt viśeṣyārthaḥ / ataś caivāyaṃ strīva gacchati
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366_8: ṣaṇḍo 'yam ity upameyaliṅgaṃ na bhajate / dharmavāci tu viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaliṅgam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366_9: tad uktam - guṇavacanānām āśrayato liṅgavacanāni bhavanti iti / tad evam upamānam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366_10: upameyavibhaktiṃ na na bhajate dharmitvaṃ ca na jahātīti / khalatā durjanatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366_11: khalatā ākāśavallī / atra prayukta iti / tarur ivety atra / vākyabhedaprasaṅgād iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366_12: saṃbhavaty ekavākyatve vākyabhedaś ca neṣyate iti vākyabhedasya pratipattigauravavattvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366_13: dheyatvam / atha samāsoktīti / anavaratajaletyāder viśeṣaṇasya dvyarthatvāt / upamānabhūteti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:367_0: na sākṣād upādāna ity arthaḥ / kva cid iti / babhravaḥ kapilāḥ / etad dāvāgniviśeṣaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:367_1: san nakulalakṣaṇam arthaṃ pratipādayatīti dharmidharmobhayātmatvam / evaṃ hariṇā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:367_2: haritā mṛgāś ca / jaṭā mūlāni keśasaṃniveśāś ca / valkalaṃ vṛkṣatvak tatkṛtaṃ ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:367_3: vāsaḥ / kapilāḥ piṅgalā muniviśeṣāś ca / āropaviṣayabahutvād āropyamānānām api bahutvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:368_0: kesariṇaṃ bakulapuṣpavantaṃ siṃhaṃ ca / vasantaṃ mādhavaṃ nivasantaṃ ca / abhimāno
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:368_1: dhārādhirūḍho māno mahāpramāṇaś ca / durvāraṇo 'śakyavāraṇo duṣṭaś ca karī / matto
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:368_2: matsakāśāt samadaś ca / abhimāna iti na tathā hṛdayaṅgamaḥ pāṭhaḥ / anyonyam iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:368_3: vasantam ity asya kesariṇam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:369_0: siṃhapakṣe ca kesariṇam ity asya vasantam iti / rūpyeti yaḥ kesarī pratītaḥ sa vasantasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:369_1: rūpakatvena na tāṭasthyena / evaṃ vasantam ity asya nivasanārthayoge 'pi vasantārthaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:369_2: kesariṇo rūpakatvena yojanīyaḥ / ittham eva durvāraṇābhimānayor vācyam / viśeṣyatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:370_1: gṛhyate / tilakas taruviśeṣas tilakaś ca viśeṣakaḥ / tadabhivyaktir ubhayārthābhivyaktiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:370_2: tayor ubhayor arthayoḥ / guṇavanto rajjuyuktā api ghaṭakāḥ saṅghaṭayitāro hrasvāś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:371_0: na tu vakṣyamāṇayuktyā pṛthivīvikārā vyākhyeyāḥ guṇavattvaghaṭakatvayor iti / yady
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:371_1: apy atra samīhitasiddhau hetutvena vyavasthitasya ghaṭakā ity asya pārthivā iti prati viśeṣaṇatvaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:372: tathāpi kūpa ivety upamāsāmarthyād viśeṣyatvam api ghaṭate //
